I've realized I have this personality over the past few years and I've been working on fixing it. My sister associated with me a haunting period of 3 years in high school. During these years, she was very upset with me when I was away from home from school, and my mother made her take care of me. While, maybe my sister didn't want it either, and I didn't want it either. Because our sisters are not close. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 9 April 2021 Angel: 49 Vehuel Dream and Analysis: ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU, This week, I continue doing my part-time job and maybe I don't really focus on chant the Angel, and I also don't remember any dreams. I chant Angel 49 with the question: why do I too focus on matter? IT IS A PROFOUND QUESTION THAT YOU ASKED, NHU... AND BEING TOO FOCUS ON MATTER DEPENDS ON MEMORIES OF EACH PERSON... AND YOU HAD YOUR ANSWER IN THE FOLLOWING SHARING... BUT IN GENERAL, BEING TOO FOCUS ON MATTER IS RELATED TO A LACK OF SPIRITUALITY... AND WHEN WE SAY SPIRITUALITY, IT IS ABOUT BEING ABLE TO BE DETACHED FROM MATTER AND BEING ABLE TO INFUSE THE RIGHT INTENTION IN OUR ACTIONS... FOCUSSING ON MATTER IS NOT WRONG IF WE HAVE THE RIGHT INTENTION, A SPIRITUAL INTENTION, WHERE WE ARE DETACH FROM MATTER... IT MEANS THAT WE DO OUR BEST BUT WE DON'T LOOK JUST FOR THE RESULT, WE ACCEPT THE RESULT KNOWING THAT THE RESULT DEPENDS ON THE UNIVERSE SINCE WE HAVE DONE OUR BEST...BUT IT IS TRUE THAT IF WE ARE OVER-FOCUS ON MATTER IT CAN CREATE DISTURBANCES, FRUSTRATIONS, ANGER, SADNESS, ETC. AND EVENTUALLY BEING TOO FOCUS ON MATTER CAN MAKE PEOPLE LOSE THEIR RECEPTIVITY TO WHAT IS RIGHT... TOWARDS THE PLAN OF THE UNIVERSE... AND DREAMS CAN GIVE THE ANSWERS AS TO WHAT YOU CAN BE AWARE OF WHEN YOU FOCUS ON MATTER. UP ABOVE HELPS US KNOW OUR DEEPER INTENTIONS, AND GRADUALLY AND PROGRESSIVELY WE CAN OPERATE WITH THE RIGHT INTENTION AND SPIRITUAL KNOWLEDGE SO THAT WE MANIFEST WITH THE RIGHT ENERGY. AND OF COURSE, WE DON'T NEED TO BE PERFECT, IT IS IMPORTANT TO DO IT STEP BY STEP WHILE YOU CAN DEVELOP JOY IN THIS SPIRITUAL JOURNEY... I just want to ask about some of my present expressions. Sometimes, when I talk to some friends, my nose gets very itchy. I don't know if I have a nose disease, but it only itches when I talk, other times it's normal. Recently, when I was talking to a friend about my dream knowledge, the symbol that I was learning to heal, my nose was itchy. I kept scratching it. -> nose: related to the air (thoughts), I think maybe I still haven't clear on my mind, I have too many thoughts that conflict. So I have problems when I speak out it out. They are not identical. YES, IT IS WELL UNDERSTOOD... AND THE NOSE IS ALSO RELATED TO COMMUNICATION AS IT ALSO HELPS WITH PHONATION. IT IS ALSO RELATED TO THE CAPACITY TO SENSE AND FEEL IN OUR INNER WORLD. YES, YOU MAY HAVE CONFLICTING THOUGHTS WHILE YOU SPEAK AND THE ITCHING HELPS YOU TO TAKE A MOMENT AND RETHINK WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO SPEAK. It is normally very cold. I feel like there's always a thick ice sheet around my brain, cold and numb. THE COLD IS RELATED TO THE FROZEN EMOTIONS, IT IS RELATED TO THE MEMORIES MARKED BY LACK OF LOVE. THERE ARE MEMORIES RELATED TO THE EMOTIONAL COLDNESS IN THE COLLECTIVE, SO WHEN YOU ARE OUTSIDE, INTERACTING WITH THE PEOPLE THESE MEMORIES GET TRIGGERED. When I need to think a lot, my head hurts, especially at work IT COULD BE BECAUSE OF MANY THOUGHTS AT ONCE IN YOUR MIND. IT'S LIKE A COMPUTER WITH MANY PROGRAMS RUNNING AT ONCE AND THUS THE COMPUTER GETS HANGED. THEN EITHER THE PROGRAMS NEED TO BE OPENED/CLOSED AT THE RIGHT MOMENTOR THE COMPUTER NEEDS TO BE RESTARTED OR UPDATING THE CAPACITY OF THE COMPUTER :-). AND IF YOU HAVE HEADACHE IT IS BECAUSE YOU CAN BE OVER- EMISSIVE AT TIMES... YOU CAN FORCE YOURSELF TO THINK... AND IT CAN HAPPEN WHEN YOU ARE TOO FOCUS ON MATTER, ON RESULT... AND ONE DAY, WE CAN THINK FAST AND A LOT WITHOUT HAVING HEADACHE :-) AND TAKE A MOMENT TO REST THE THOUGHTS WITH A DEEP BREATHE, A GLASS OF WATER FOR A FEW MINUTE SO AS TO RESTART WITH A RENEWED ENERGY... The intensity of work and the specifics of work make me need to brainstorm a lot, so at first, I feel both painful and cold. Not only that, I just talk to the people around, I need to think about what I heard, I also had a headache. And after each time, it took me some time to rest, to calm my brain to start over. WE HAVE COMPASSION FOR YOU, FOR WHAT YOU ARE FACING, NHU. YOU CAN GRADUALLY INCULCATE THE HABIT OF MEDITATING EACH DAY FOR SOMETIMES.... 20 MINUTES IS RECOMMENDED... AND YOU DON'T NEED TO DO 20 MINUTES AT ONCE, YOU CAN MEDITATE FOR 5 MINUTES FEW TIMES A DAY. THIS WILL HELP YOU REMAIN CALM AND CENTERED THROUGHOUT THE DAY. ALSO, YOU CAN TRY DOING SOME BREATHING EXERCISES WHICH WILL HELP YOU TO CALM YOUR MIND AND MANAGE THE NUMBER OF THOUGHTS. THE CALM BREATH MAKES THE MIND CALM, WHILE RESTLESS BREATHING TRIGGERS RESTLESSNESS IN THE MIND. But in reality, it is normally always cold. It is related to my emotions. My emotion was frozen. So maybe I can't feel the emotion in life too. So far, when I discover my problem, I start to heal, change my thought, I feel better a little, but my brain still feels cold. HERE YOU CAN OBSERVE THE BEHAVIOR OF ALL THE PARTS OF YOU WHICH WILL HELP YOU TO UNDERSTAND CERTAIN INSTINCTUAL NEEDS, AND BEHAVIORS. SINCE YOU SEE MEN, WOMEN, AND FAMILY, SO THE DREAM IS REVEALING AN ASPECT OF YOUR MASCULINE POLARITY, FEMININE POLARITY, AND ALSO HOW YOU MAY SOMETIMES BEHAVE BECAUSE OF THE INFLUENCE OF INSTINCTS, IN YOUR INTIMACY WITH YOUR FAMILY. THE ANIMALS ARE ALSO LINKED WITH YOUR ENERGY OF MANIFESTATION, YOUR VITAL ENERGY, BUT ALSO YOUR INSTINCTUAL NEEDS... Nghia is a colleague of mine. [+ Quiet personality, a personality I like in a man, attentive, listening, careful, framework, polite, have a good will, endeavor, honesty, sincerity, faithfulness. ] [- Stubborn, difficult to accept new things, following atheism, not believing in spirituality, talking about personal stories with many people (not discreet), patriarchs. ] This zoo has dense forests , caves, and diverse terrain. AND THE CAVE IS A NOTION THAT YOU ARE ENTERING IN YOUR UNCONSCIOUS MORE AND MORE, YOU ARE DISCOVERING CERTAIN ORIGINS OF CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES RELATED TO MOTIVATION... Zoo showed that I was going slightly deep on instinctual needs. [+ revealing, diverse inner world, conscious and uncóncious, observation, learning, YES... YOU UNDERSTOOD IT WELL ] People walk in tunnels (caves type) with some orange furry monkeys , reddish-brown skinned on the walls, creepers . In this zoo, there is nothing between humans and animals, I find them very free, comfortable, close to them. They are very gentle and friendly, they are eating plants normally. Some children are scared, some are happy, I see them happy. HERE I INVITE YOU TO ANALYZE THE KEY SYMBOLS, DEAR NHU... FOR EXAMPLE, YOU CAN ANALYZE THE SYMBOL OF ORANGE FURRY MONKEY WITH THE APPROPRIATE STYLE... YOU CAN WATCH AGAIN THE TUTORIAL :-)... AND IN ITS PARTICULARITY, MONKEY IS KNOWN TO IMITATE OTHERS, SO UNCONSCIOUSLY (TUNNEL CAVES TYPE) YOU CAN EVENTUALLY REPEAT CERTAIN PATTERNS BECAUSE OF A LACK OF DISCERNMENT... AND YOU CAN LET YOUR INSTINCTUAL NEEDS TAKE TOO MUCH PLACE IN YOUR CONSCIENCE AT TIMES... BUT WHAT IS GOOD, IS THAT ALL THE ANIMALS ARE GENTLE BUT AT THE SAME TIME ANYTHING COULD HAPPEN WITH ANIMALS IF THEY FEEL ANY THREAT OR IF THEY ARE NOT HAPPY, OR IF THEY ARE HUNGRY...AND SOMETIMES, YOU CAN BE AFRAID ABOUT YOUR OWN UNCONSCIOUS NEEDS... -> Monkeys in zoo: I am not making a clear line between instinctive needs and spiritual, social needs, I am setting them free. I have it all in my mind and I think I'm doing my best by harmonizing them. I let everything grow naturally. IF THE ANIMALS ARE FREE IN THE ZOO, STILL THEY CAN HARM SOMEONE, OR EVEN IF THEY DO NOT HARM, THE CHILDREN CAN BE SCARED OF THEM AS IT IS HAPPENING IN YOUR DREAM. The child reflects for me, sometimes I feel satisfied, sometimes not. YES, VERY WELL ANALYZED. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 23 April 2021 Angel: 32 Vasariah Dream mood: Conflict, Worry, doubt Dream and Analysis: ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU, This week I still don't remember dreams, just 1 image and I do not really remember it. So I just tell you my week, somethings happen. YES, YOU CAN ANALYZE YOUR DAY-TO-DAY LIFE LIKE A DREAM AND CAN GET A PROFOUND UNDERSTANDING. At the beginning of the week, I withdraw a sizable amount of cash from the bank to deposit it into another of my accounts. But when I loaded in with an ATM, I put the full amount in, I was a bit in a hurry to do this, so all my cash was stuck in the ATM and in my account also no extra enter money. I am quite worried that I will lose all of this money or not. I contacted a bank officer to talk about this emergency. I worry that when I go away the machine might open and someone will take all my money. Meanwhile, the Bank staff did not say clearly about my money being lost or not, they only recognized and responded that it would be processed. AND IF YOU SEE THAT AS A DREAM, THIS INCIDENT IS SHOWING CERTAIN INSECURITIES REGARDING MONEY, RESOURCES, AND THE FEAR OF LOSING ENERGY/WILLPOWER TO MATERIALIZE. I have the ability to sometimes take the problem seriously, small issues also to be very serious.YES AND IT HAPPENS BECAUSE OF THE MEMORIES OF INSECURITIES COMING FROM PAST LIVES. HERE IT IS MORE THE NOTION THAT IT IS IMPORTANT FOR YOU TO FOLLOW THE NATURAL FLOW AS WITH THE PROBLEM WITH THE ATM... IF THE MALE COLLEAGUE, MALE BOSS, WAS THERE, IT WAS ALSO FOR A REASON... Compared to when I go to work/study, I show a beautiful, simple and luxurious, discreet (high-walled white house), showing how I ascend on the social level. YES VERY WELL UNDERSTOOD... YOU CAN SEE A CERTAIN DISCREPANCY BETWEEN WHAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO DEVELOP (PICTURE) AND WHAT KIND OF MEMORIES YOU STILL HAVE INSIDE... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE... When I got home it was almost dark, SO YOU ARE REACHING TO THE UNCONSCIOUS MEMORIES... IT SHOWS PATTERNS THAT YOU ARE NOT ALWAYS AWARE OF... I I saw on the porch with my ex-lover [+ gentle, obedient, simple, loyal ] [- unfaithful, unclear, complicated ] and a friend (a man I don't know) drinking. YOU ARE ALSO BEING SHOWN AN UNKNOWN ASPECT OF YOU WHERE YOU ARE NOURISHING EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES AND HERE YOU SEE ALSO THAT YOU HAVE MEMORIES RELATED TO YOUR EX-LOVER, YOU HAVE STILL RESONANCES REGARDING THE SITUATION YOU LIVED WITH HIM AND THIS IS ALSO THE OLD HOUSE AND THE IRON ROOF THAT YOU HAVE NEGLECTED... SOMETIMES YOU CAN LET EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES, ANGER, MEMORIES OF BEING COMPLICATED ENTER IN YOUR THOUGHTS... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE... THAT IS WHY YOU WANTED TO HAVE \"HIGH WALLS\" IN THE PICTURE... TO PROTECT YOUR INTIMACY... I'm pretty angry right now. I went in front of these two, I poured beer cans on their faces, then I threw objects around at my ex. When I throw an object, I put a lot of force but somehow I can't hit the person's face even if I have the right direction. It's only a small hit, doesn't affect much. THIS SHOWS HOW YOU DEAL WITH YOURSELF AND ALSO WITH OTHERS WHEN YOU ARE ANGRY AND ARE OPERATING WITH THE ENERGY OF YOUR INNER EX-LOVER AND AN INNER UNKNOWN MAN. Inside I still remember the mistakes of my ex, I still have feelings of hating this person that wants revenge. YES, WE UNDERSTAND... They are lovers. They are in a slightly dark room, in a house (unconscious). YES, AN UNKNOWN ASPECT OF YOUR INTIMACY This is daytime. They are taking revenge on those who have hurt them, they revenge in work, in the marketplace. This man is a businessman, he also has a dark force behind him, like the mafia. This woman knows a lot about his work and personal, even though she doesn't know it all. -> 2 people represent my 2 polarities. The man is the same as my imagination when I was a child. After only a few minutes, the man's phone rang again and again, but the man didn't pick up. Because he knew that the other person was getting revenge and they begged him for help. This man put his phone aside and put it on silent mode. THIS SHOWS THAT A PART OF YOU NEEDS TO TAKE REVENGE AND THERE CAN BE MEMORIES IN YOU THAT FEEL WRONGED . After they made love, the woman gets up to cook with the maid, it is still daytime. Then, this man gets up and being about to turn on the light switch in the corner to put on his shirt. Accidentally he is caught at the table in that corner. There is a window in this corner where this man could be seen by outsiders, dimly. Incidentally, the house right next to the woman's house is her sister's house. 2 windows can be seen each other. It is both a bedroom. And her sister (I don't know her) was also one of the people this man avenged. Although the woman knows this, she doesn't stop her. She thought this man did the right thing. Because according to the law of cause and effect, you will reap what you sow. THIS SHOWS HOW YOU CAN BE SOMETIMES TOO TOUGH ON YOURSELF OR ON OTHERS. YES WE REAP WHAT WE SOW, BUT WE ARE NOT IN CHARGE TO GIVE BACK TO A PERSON WHAT HE/SHE HAS DONE NEGATIVELY... WE DON'T TAKE REVENGE... Meanwhile, her sister knows she like this man but does not know the level of closeness between the two. AT TIMES... BECAUSE OF A DIFFICULTY TO SELF- QUESTION CERTAIN PATTERNS... -> I am too focused on the law of cause and effect and do not understand the mistakes of others, showing that I do not understand that I receive the damage caused by my karma, it is also a part of me, but I am blaming others and avenging them. YES, RIGHTLY UNDERSTOOD Her sister accidentally caught a glimpse of this man in the other girl's bedroom, shirtless. Her sister dimly guesses and is looking for this man. This man also accidentally sees her sister, quickly hid and informed the woman about this. And he wants to run away and wants the girl to find a way to cope. When he looks out at the balcony (thinking, thoughts, relax) in front of the house, he sees her sister standing right in front of the gate. But perhaps contact could not be reached, her sister immediately runs through the gate to enter the house. The man follows the balcony upstairs, goes left, toward the railing, and jumps into the yard next door to hide. Although the height is quite tall high, he is fine and escapes successfully. title_pdf: 13 Life - Report. last case id: C0187. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 18 June 2021 Angel: 21 Nelkhael Dream mood: Tired, Confuse Dream and Analysis: Hello Professors, ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU, This week I chanted Angel 21 Nelkhael with the intention: please help me transform distortion about Difficulties in apprenticeship. I lack power so sometimes I had manipulated others to do things that I want. AS YOU SAID ABOUT MANIPULATION AND JEALOUSY , WHEN YOU START TO WORK FOR DEVELOPING QUALITIES, INSTEAD OF JEALOUSY OR MANIPULATION, YOUR FOCUS WOULD BE MORE ON CO-OPERATION, LEARNING FROM OTHERS, AND WORKING WITH THE TEAM AS A WHOLE. A DIMENSION THAT IS BASED ON ALTRUISM... BECAUSE JEALOUSY AND ANXIETY WILL AUTOMATICALLY LEAD TO DIFFICULTIES.... SOONER OR LATER.... SO IT IS AN OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN TO ORGANIZE YOUR INNER DATABASE. IT'S LEARNING TO ADAPT AS THINGS CHANGE DYNAMICALLY IN LIFE. AND YOU SEE ALSO THAT YOU CAN ENTER IN RESONANCE WITH YOUR SUPERIORS... OF COURSE, AT THE SAME TIME IT IS GOOD TO LEARN TO BE FLEXIBLE AND NOT COUNTING YOUR EFFORTS BECAUSE YOU KNOW THAT THE EFFORTS WITH THE RIGHT INTENTION WILL MAKE YOU A BETTER SOUL... title_pdf: 17 Life - Low blood pressure (hypotension). last case id: C0191. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 10 September 2021 Angel: 9 Haziel Dream and Analysis: ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU, This week I can't remember dreams, but I found something that I've been wondering about for a long time, it's pretty amazing. NICE INITIATIVE TO DECODE THE LIFE Today, I received my second dose of the vaccine. During the examination, the nurse reminded me that I have low blood pressure (hypotension) [- blood represents vital energy and the world of vital emotions. Blood is red, the color of 1st Charkram which represents materialization, concrete action on the physical level. So when I have low low blood pressure or anemia, I think I lack motivation, lack of ability to actually take concrete action; difficulty becoming involved, manifesting YES RIGHTLY UNDERSTOOD AND YOU CAN SEE THAT ONE OF THE FUNCTIONS OF THE BLOOD IS TO PROVIDE NUTRIENTS AND OXYGEN TO ALL THE BODY... AND OXYGEN IS RELATED TO THE POSITIVE THOUGHTS THAT NOURISH POSITIVE EMOTIONS... YOU CAN EVEN ANALYZE THE VACCINE AS IF IT IS A DREAM... YOU ARE DISCOVERING YOURSELF BY UNDERSTANDING HOW TO PREVENT YOURSELF FROM BEING AFFECTED BY AN INNER AND OUTER VIRUS... E ] Actually, I've known I have had hypotension for a couple of years, however, I had never paid much attention to it. I went home and thoroughly researched this disease, I began to be surprised and happy to find out the main cause of my physical symptoms for so long. Especially about being cold inside, always feel an iceberg around my head And I think I need to analyze it carefully to see how symbolically I need to understand and should transform. LET'S DIVE INTO THIS DEEP UNDERSTANDING 1. Low blood pressure is a disease that causes blood vessels to constrict, reducing the volume and flow of circulating blood. Blood pressure readings below 90/60 mmHg. I thought I had a mild and prolonged illness, not a serious one. It's not really a disease of the type of rapid decline but physiological blood pressure. AND BEING CONSTRICTED SHOWS THE STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS OF BEING TOO RIGID, TOO TENSE THAT CREATES THE OPPOSITE ASPECT OF BEING LAZY, NOT WANTING TO MANIFEST... 2. Causes: living in high mountains [- mountain represents action world, high mountain link about thoughts world too, it represents lack of vision, blur AND IT REPRESENTS ALSO A DISCONNECTION WITH THE WORLD OF MATTER IN THE NEGATIVE ASPECT... IT CAN SHOW THE TENDENCY TO FLEE MATTER BECAUSE OF CERTAIN NEGATIVE MEMORIES... MOUNTAINS ALSO IMPLY ESCAPING FROM MATTER , THE WORLD OF ACTION AND MANIFESTATION.....WE CAN ASSOCIATE MOUNTAINS TO A STATE OF INTERIORIZATION AND ELEVATION BY DEVELOPING A GLOBAL VISION TOO.... ] and long-term stress. These are the causes that I find myself suffering from and are likely to make my current anemia. AND IT IS INTERESTING TO NOTICE THAT WHEN PEOPLE INTERIORIZE, MOST OF THE TIME THEY SIT AND WHILE SITTING FOR A PROLONGED TIME, IT CAN LOWER DOWN THE PRESSURE OF THE BLOOD THAN NORMAL.... AND WHEN ONE SITS IN THE LOTUS POSITION FOR A LONG TIME, HE/SHE MAY FEEL A NUMBNESS IN THE LEGS....WHICH IS BECAUSE OF THE LESS BLOOD FLOW INTO THE LEGS, SO IT INHIBITS THE ADVANCEMENT INTO THE WORLD SO YOU SEE HERE TOO MUCH MEDITATION IS NOT GOOD, TOO INTENSE IN THE MATERIALIZATION IS NOT GOOD EITHER... AND YOU SEE THAT BEING LIMITED WITH ANEMIA SHOWS THAT IN PAST LIVES, YOU WERE USING YOUR VITAL ENERGY TOO INTENSELY... AND NOW YOU HAVE PROFOUND SPIRITUAL KNOWLEDGE SO THAT YOU CAN INCARNATE INTO THE WORLD OF ACTION WITH A BEAUTIFUL INTERIORIZED AND SACRED INTENTION FILLED WITH WISDOM, CARING, AND RIGHT MOTIVATION TO MOVE FORWARD ANGELICALLY... 3. Symptoms that I have - Feeling dizzy: when I go up and downstairs a lot, sit for a long time and suddenly change position. AND HERE IT MEANS A DIFFICULTY TO WELL BALANCED EMISSIVITY AND RECEPTIVITY... AND ALSO A DIFFICULTY TO REACTIVATE YOUR VITAL ENERGY WHILE YOU ARE IN A RECEPTIVE MODE... - Severe headache: The headache will get worse each time the brain is stressed or heavy physical activity. Each time there is a different degree of headache, sometimes more severe pain in the top of the head. Sometimes the pain is more severe, both painful and numb. DIZZINESS AND HEADACHE CAN ALSO BE ASSOCIATED WITH EXCESS OF THOUGHTS...TOO MUCH LIVING IN MIND... AND REMEMBER... PAIN IS A SIGNAL FROM THE BODY THAT THERE IS SOMETHING TO CHANGE WHETHER IN YOUR THOUGHT, EMOTIONS OR BEHAVIORS AND ONCE YOU CAN DECODE WITH THE SYMBOLIC LANGUAGE, YOU CAN PROGRESSIVELY TRANSFORM ANY NEGATIVITIES WITH LOVE AND PATIENCE... - Decreased concentration: when the body lowers blood pressure, the blood supply to the brain will not be as normal as usual, thereby causing brain cells not to receive enough oxygen and nutrients to function properly. This is the main reason that hinders the ability to concentrate in people with low blood pressure. YES... THAT IS WHY I SUGGEST YOU CONTINUE TO MEDITATE AND DO BREATHING EXERCISES TO BRING POSITIVE THOUGHTS WHILE TRANSFORMING NEGATIVITY... AND BREATHING EXERCISE CAN JUST TAKE FEW MINUTES PER DAY, IT WILL HELP YOU TO OXYGENATE THE WHOLE BODY BUT NOT JUST IN THE PHYSICAL LEVEL BUT ALSO IN YOUR INTENTION... - Blurred vision: People with severely low blood pressure will show signs of hearing loss, reduced vision, blurred vision. Sudden blurred vision can be dangerous if you're on the road. YES... AND IT IS A STRONG SIGNAL FOR YOU TO CHANGE SOMETHING IN THE WAY YOU PERCEIVE CERTAIN SITUATIONS... IT CAN BE GOOD IF YOU CAN ANALYZE WHEN THE BLURRED VISION OCCURS... BECAUSE IT WILL SHOWS WHAT TRIGGERS THE BLURRED VISION... IT SHOWS THAT SOMETIMES YOU DON'T WANT TO FACE CERTAIN ORDEALS, CERTAIN SITUATIONS... - Nausea: I have nausea in stages, episodes. There was a time when I even suffered from acid reflux. NAUSEA AND ACID REFLUX IS RELATED TO WEAK DIGESTION. DIGESTION IS ASSOCIATED WITH THE ABILITY OR THE INABILITY TO DIGEST THE EXPERIENCES OF LIFE. SOMETIMES WHEN THE SOUL IS TOO TIRED WITH THE DIFFICULT EXPERIENCES OF LIFE (DUE TO THE DIFFICULTY TO UNDERSTAND AND DECODE LIFE) IT MAY ESCAPE INTO MOUNTAINS (EXCESSIVE DETACHMENT) FROM THE WORLD. BUT THE MEMORIES OF A DIFFICULTY TO DIGEST LIFE'S EXPERIENCES SHOW UP IN THE FORM OF DIGESTION ISSUES, ACID, NAUSEA, ETC... AND NAUSEA IS ALSO RELATED TO WANTING TO ELIMINATE WHAT CANNOT BE DIGESTED... - Cold, moist, or pale skin: When your blood pressure is low, your limbs often feel numb and cold inside. This is because your body is unable to maintain blood flow and oxygen delivery to the skin, causing hypothermia. This I find quite similar to the fact that I have a cold inside my body, in addition to being cold in my head, I am also cold in other parts, especially the joints of my legs and arms. WE CAN ASSOCIATE THE COLDNESS TO THE COLDNESS OF EMOTIONS ALSO... AND THE COLDNESS ACTS LIKE A PROTECTION SO AS NOT TO FEEL CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES AS WELL AS THE BLURRED VISION SO AS NOT TO SEE... - Fatigue: usually appears in the morning, I often feel mentally tired, my limbs are numb, tired, and have no vitality. In the afternoon or evening, the body appears tired again, although not just overworked. YES, THE LACK OF MOTIVATION FROM THE DEEP MEMORIES WITHIN CAN CAUSE FATIGUE... AND AT THE SAME TIME, IF YOU FEEL TIRED IT IS IMPORTANT TO SEE IF EVERYTHING IS OK REGARDING EATING HABITS... THAT YOU HAVE ENOUGH NUTRIENTS, VITAMINS IN THE PHYSICAL LEVEL... - Depression: Patients with low blood pressure often have a sluggish, sad mood and are very prone to depression. AND DEPRESSION IS RELATED TO RELEASING THE PRESSURE YOU PUT ON YOURSELF... IT IS AN EMERGENCE OF A BIG BLOCK OF MEMORIES THAT WERE REPRESSED... WE ARE HAPPY THAT YOU MEET THIS SPIRITUAL KNOWLEDGE... IT WILL TRULY HELP YOU TO BUILD A BETTER LIFE... - Feeling thirsty: When blood pressure drops, the body will receive a signal from the brain to drink more water, adding more water will help increase blood pressure. I drink quite a lot of water and always feel thirsty. AND YOU SEE HOW THE SOUL AND THE BODY HAVE A MECHANISM OF PROTECTION AND COMPENSATION AT THE SAME TIME... THE LACK OF EMOTIONS WITHIN IS COMPENSATED WITH THE SIGNAL OF BEING THIRSTY SO THAT YOU CAN START TO DRINK IN THE OUTSIDE WHAT IS MISSING INSIDE... BUT HERE WE CAN EVEN TALK ABOUT A POSITIVE MECHANISM OF COMPENSATION... BECAUSE YOUR BRAIN KNOWS INSTINCTIVELY THAT YOU NEED TO DRINK TO INCREASE BLOOD PRESSURE, OTHERWISE HAVING LOW BLOOD PRESSURE CAN TRIGGER DIFFICULTIES AND PROBLEMS... WHEN WE THINK ABOUT IT, IT IS AMAZING HOW THE BODY ALWAYS WANTS TO FIND AN EQUILIBRIUM... Causes: living in high mountains and long-term stress. These are the causes that I find myself suffering from and are likely to make my current anemia. Symptoms that I have - Feeling dizzy: when I go up and downstairs a lot, sit for a long time and suddenly change position. - Severe headache: The headache will get worse each time the brain is stressed or heavy physical activity. Each time there is a different degree of headache, sometimes more severe pain in the top of the head. Sometimes the pain is more severe, both painful and numb. - Decreased concentration: when the body lowers blood pressure, the blood supply to the brain will not be as normal as usual, thereby causing brain cells not to receive enough oxygen and nutrients to function properly. This is the main reason that hinders the ability to concentrate in people with low blood pressure. - Blurred vision: People with severely low blood pressure will show signs of hearing loss, reduced vision, blurred vision. Sudden blurred vision can be dangerous if you're on the road. - Nausea: I have nausea in stages, episodes. There was a time when I even suffered from acid reflux. - Cold, moist, or pale skin: When your blood pressure is low, your limbs often feel numb and cold inside. This is because your body is unable to maintain blood flow and oxygen delivery to the skin, causing hypothermia. This I find quite similar to the fact that I have a cold inside my body, in addition to being cold in my head, I am also cold in other parts, especially the joints of my legs and arms. - Fatigue: usually appears in the morning, I often feel mentally tired, my limbs are numb, tired, and have no vitality. In the afternoon or evening, the body appears tired again, although not just overworked. - Depression: Patients with low blood pressure often have a sluggish, sad mood and are very prone to depression. - Feeling thirsty: When blood pressure drops, the body will receive a signal from the brain to drink more water, adding more water will help increase blood pressure. I drink quite a lot of water and always feel thirsty. After I learned about the symptoms and causes, I found it all connected with emotional (water), lack of emotion (anemia, feeling thirsty all the time), no emotion (cold inside). ), living in the highlands (blurred vision), depression.",
    "state_of_mind": "wondering",
    "notes": "From PDF: 17 Life - Low blood pressure (hypotension)"
  }
]

UP ABOVE UNVEILS IMPORTANT AND OLD MEMORIES SO THAT YOU CAN MAKE THE RIGHT DECISION IN YOUR LIFE A few weeks ago, I listened to Mr. An and went to hospital about my low blood pressure. And a few unexpected things happened to me. I went to Binh Thanh hospital. When I entered hospital, the staff informed me that my insurance card has expired, cannot be used. I was confused, they sent me information they exported from system, I found it to be slow to update, so I reported it to company. The company told me that this information was managed by the Ministry of Health so they couldn't process it right away, and in the end, I decided to do it without insurance. When I checked with doctor, doctor measured my blood pressure twice and said that my blood pressure readings are completely normal, no problems at all. I was surprised because that morning I still hadn't eaten anything to keep my body intact, went to doctor. I shared my symptoms, doctor just said that she did not detect my disease and gave me tonics to drink. I found it quite absurd, so next day, I continued to go to another hospital that I usually go to first. When measuring my blood pressure, doctor found that my blood pressure was low and asked me to do some tests on my heart, carotid arteries. I went to check all of them according to doctor's instructions, then she read results: I don't have low blood pressure, results are good and there is no cause for blood pressure. I was surprised again, continued to tell all my symptoms, especially emphasizing fact that I always felt cold in my head and inside my body, doctor reassured me and said that it could be due to a temporary psychological effect or because of atopic, cause blood pressure to be a bit low. And she also gave me tonics too. I was completely surprised by results of all examinations, at that time I was really having a headache, cold inside, I was hoping I could be given some medicine to relieve this pain, even temporarily. However, things were not quite what I expected. After that, I just took medicine for a few days, changed to angel Habuhiah to heal. Now after about 3 weeks, I am much better and pain is much less. I wonder if my illness can be only felt and understood on a spiritual level, but cannot find a cause to cure on a physical level? FIRST OF ALL CONGRATULATIONS TO YOU FOR YOUR HEALTHY REPORTS... title_pdf: 29 Dream - ask right time. last case id: C0203. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 3 December 2021 Angel: 21 Nelkhael Dream and Analysis: Hi teachers, ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU This week, I have a question to continue my intention of work: when is the right time to change my job? LET SEE WHAT UP ABOVE ANSWERED :-) My company organizes outings. Everyone has to get 2 injections of the vaccine [- vaccine represents self-protection, creating resistance. Minuses are overprotection, denial, lack of receptivity, lack of understanding, lack of understanding of the law of resonance, karma. The number 2 represents the relationship. This means in the relationship, I lack understanding and have a certain resistance AND THE VACCINE IS A PROFOUND SYMBOL OF INJECTING A VERY SMALL DOSE OF NEGATIVITY SO THAT THE BODY CAN LEARN HOW TO DEFEND HIMSELF, HOW NOT TO BE TOO MUCH AFFECTED... A VACCINE CAN BE COMPARED TO A NIGHTMARE THAT THE UNIVERSE IS SENDING SO THAT OUR CONSCIOUSNESS CAN BE READY TO TRANSFORM THE NEGATIVE MEMORIES THAT DWELL IN THE SOUL... SO HERE YOU SEE CERTAIN DIFFICULTY TO UNDERSTAND THAT EVIL IS EDUCATIONAL... THAT EVIL EXISTS TO SERVE THE GOOD... ] . The first injection is basic all-around protection, 2nd injection is for better protection. AND THE FACT THAT EVERYONE HAS ONE FIRST INJECTION BEFORE GOING OUT SHOWS THE % OF ATTITUDE IN YOU WHERE YOU WOULD SOMETIMES BE TOO KEEN TO COME OUT OF THE UNEASY SITUATION CONSIDERING THAT YOU CAN TAKE CARE OF THE SITUATION, BUT MIGHT NOT BE FULLY EQUIPPED TO DEAL WITH THE SITUATION. FOR E.G YOU CAN FEEL THAT THE TIME IS RIGHT TO CHANGE THE JOB, BUT PERHAPS YOUR PREPARATION FOR A CHANGE IS NOT FOOLPROOF AS OF NOW. IT IS LIKE CHANGING THE JOB WILL HELP YOU TO AVOID EXPERIENCING THE DIFFICULT EMOTIONS, MEMORIES THAT YOU CAN EVENTUALLY LIVE IN YOUR CURRENT JOB... BUT AS SAID IN THE PREVIOUS DREAM, IT IS SO IMPORTANT TO MEDITATE ON THE MEMORIES THAT YOU ARE LIVING IN YOUR CURRENT JOB... BECAUSE THESE MEMORIES WILL ACCOMPANY YOU EVERYWHERE AND EVEN AFTER THIS LIFE IF THESE MEMORIES ARE NOT TRANSFORMED INTO WISDOM... THAT IS WHY SEEING YOUR MEMORIES IN DREAMS IS SUCH A BLESSING FOR YOUR SOUL... BECAUSE YOU HAVE THE TOOLS TO REPROGRAM EVERYTHING... In working and relationships with colleagues, I lack understanding and sharing, and at the same time, I have excessive defensiveness while working with others. When we started going out, everyone had done with the first injection. AND IN THE LOGIC OF MATTER, IT NEEDS TO HAVE TIME BETWEEN THE FIRST AND THE SECOND INJECTION... SO HERE IT MEANS THAT YOU CAN BE TOO IMPATIENT, YOU WOULD LIKE TO EXPAND IN MATTER, TO LIVE SOMETHING DIFFERENTLY THAN YOUR ACTUAL JOB... BECAUSE THE COVID IS ALSO RELATED TO MANY COMPANIES THAT HAD TO CLOSE, IT IS THUS RELATED TO BANKRUPTCY, INSECURITIES, FEAR OF LOSING, AND THESE MEMORIES CREATE A NEED FOR MATERIAL ABUNDANCE AFTERWARDS... The second injection is self-injected [- individualism, excessive self-protection, isolation, denial of help, lack of communication on the social level ] , so there are brave people who inject themselves first. THE FACT THAT THE INJECTION IS SELF-INJECTED SHOWS THE MEMORIES OF TOO MUCH EMISSIVITY AND USE OF EXCESS OF WILLPOWER TO PROTECT ONESELF. ALSO SHOWS A LACK OF SUPPORTIVE INNER GOVERNMENT, IT MEANS A DIFFICULTY TO ORGANIZE AND CREATE THE RIGHT SUPPORT FOR YOURSELF. LACK OF INNER NURSE/DOCTOR ENERGY AT THE MOMENT WHICH CAN HELP TO PROTECT. SO HERE IT SHOWS ALSO THAT SOMETIMES YOU WOULD LIKE TO DO THINGS BY YOUR OWN... YOU CAN HAVE DIFFICULTIES ASKING FOR HELP, FOR SUPPORT WHEN IT IS NEEDED... YOU ARE SHOWN MEMORIES WHERE YOU CAN BE TOO INDEPENDENT... Most people will get the 2nd injection later. After the first injection, my limbs were weak, I was very tired. So I haven't injected 2nd yet. THE VACCINE CREATES A FIGHT MECHANISM IN THE BODY, WHEREIN THE BODY FIGHTS TO PROTECT ITSELF FROM THE NEUTRALIZED VIRUS. SO YOU FEEL EXHAUSTED AFTER THE FIRST VACCINE BECAUSE OF THE MEMORIES OF OVER-EMISSIVITY AND THUS A LACK OF MOTIVATION. AND THE COVID IS ALSO RELATED TO INSTINCTUAL NEEDS, LAZINESS THAT CAN GROW IN THE UNCONSCIOUSNESS... YOU SEE CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES TO UNDERSTAND EVIL... SO IT MEANS ALSO THAT YOU CAN HAVE CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES SEEING THE EDUCATIONAL PURPOSE OF YOUR CURRENT JOB AS YOU CAN BE HYPERSENSITIVE AND HAVE THE SENSATION OF NOT ADVANCING WELL IN YOUR LIFE... (LIMBS WERE WEAK)... I tend to separate myself from everyone else, so I can't understand the difficulties people face. I also refuse to help myself from colleagues when I am in trouble. This creates a contradiction within me, draining my energy and weakening it. YES, TAKING HELP ALSO MEANS OPENNESS TO HELP OTHERS, AND WHICH MAY PUT YOU IN DIFFICULTY AS YOU MAY HAVE TO COME OUT OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE, SO AN INNER MECHANISM WHICH SEPARATES YOU FROM OTHERS... Ly [- superficiality, inability to lead, lack of understanding of the law of resonance ] invited everyone in her team (another team in my company) to get the 2nd injection before returning. Because it was rumored that after the 2nd injection, they would have a fever [- lack of energy, ability to heal, lack of emission, ability to actualize, lack of motivation ] (meaning that when they go home, they will have a rest easier, but depending on the person). And before going back, everyone decided to get the 2nd injection. I take the initiative in protecting myself and getting along, helping people in my work, but I do it with the purpose of healing myself, I have not understood the law of my resonance with those around me. THIS SCENE IS SHOWING YOU THE FEAR YOU CAN EVENTUALLY HAVE CONCERNING THE TRANSFORMATION OF THE NEGATIVE MEMORIES WITHIN... YOU SEE THE FEAR YOU CAN EVENTUALLY HAVE WHEN YOU ARE THINKING ABOUT CHANGING A JOB... BY ASKING THE QUESTION ABOVE : WHEN IS THE RIGHT MOMENT TO CHANGE THE JOB ? THERE IS AN INTENTION WHERE YOU WOULD LIKE TO ABSOLUTELY RECEIVE THE PROTECTION OF THE UNIVERSE... HAVING THE GUIDANCE SO AS TO BE PROTECTED... SO AS TO MAKE SURE THAT YOU WILL NOT EXPERIENCE THE STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS OF BANKRUPTCY, INSECURITIES, ANXIETY ABOUT THE FUTURE... SO THIS DREAM IS NOT SHOWING A PRECISE TIME BUT RATHER THE INTENTION BETWEEN THE QUESTION YOU ASKED... WHERE YOU CAN LACK RECEPTIVITY AND BE MORE IN AN EMISSIVE DYNAMIC, WANTING TO DO THE INJECTION AS FAST AS POSSIBLE, TO BE PROTECTED FROM THE NEGATIVITY, FROM NEGATIVE SITUATIONS THAT CAN EVENTUALLY OCCUR IN THE FUTURE JOB... BUT HAVING FEAR AT THE SAME TIME... Because of self-injection, everyone was quite scared. Ly picked up 2nd injection, but she could not self-inject. Ly asked another sister [- represents the feminine part of my unconscious, aggressive, strong, cold, lacking in self-compassion, lack receptive, capable of excessive emission ] to inject for her. During that process, Ly was afraid and tried to stop her, but she didn't listen. She thinks that Ly is just too scared, the injection is okay and will be done quickly. A part of me, recognizing my own weakness on a social level, pushed myself to be stronger, more aggressive, more draconian, and more apathetic. I lacked listening and communicating with my inner parts THIS SCENE IS SHOWING YOU THE DUALITIES... WANTING TO HAVE THE VACCINE, BEING AFRAID AT THE SAME TIME OF IT... AND THIS IS BECAUSE THE VACCINE WILL AWAKE CERTAIN NEGATIVE MEMORIES THAT ARE WITHIN RELATED TO THE COVID-19: INSECURITIES, LAZINESS, INSTINCTUAL NEEDS, ETC. SO IT IS IMPORTANT IN YOUR WORK TO UNDERSTAND PROFOUNDLY THE DISTURBANCE YOU MAY FEEL... SO AS NOT TO REACT TOO INTENSELY REGARDING CERTAIN NEGATIVE ASPECTS THAT YOU MAY FEEL AT WORK... After injecting, Ly came back to blame her, why she still inject. I added: if it were me, I would do it quickly too. I don't think it really hurts. After that, the injection will probably still bleed a little. I still don't inject. SO YOU SEE THE DUALITIES HERE NHU, ON THE INTELLECTUAL LEVEL YOU MAY THINK THAT THERE IS NO PAIN BUT STILL ON THE PHYSICAL LEVEL YOU ARE NOT WILLING FOR INJECTION. AND THE NEEDLE IS ALSO THE NOTION OF OVER-EMISSIVITY, BEING TOO INTRUSIVE IN THE ENERGY... IT IS LIKE ALSO YOU HAVE DIFFICULTIES RECEIVING A BEAUTIFUL SUPPORT TO UNDERSTAND THAT EVIL IS EDUCATIONAL... THAT YOU WILL RECEIVE THIS INJECTION SO AS TO CREATE A GOOD IMMUNE SYSTEM... AND YOU SEE THAT IT IS NOT REALLY AT THE RIGHT PLACE SINCE YOU WERE NOT IN A HOSPITAL OR IN A PROPER STRUCTURE... IT SHOWS MEMORIES WHERE YOU CAN BE TOO INDEPENDENT, WANTING TO DO THINGS BY YOURSELF... My inner Ly has no understanding of why my inner "another sister" is cold and harsh to myself, because of my inner Ly's weakness. When there is an inner conflict going on, I tend to flee (I still don't inject) YOU CAN COMPLETE WITH COMMENTS ABOVE :-) This dream shows I lack understand and compassion on work, communicate with others on social level. There are parts in me conflict and struggle, and again, I choose to flee when I can't understand law of resonance.IT IS WELL SUMMARIZED... ALSO, THE DREAM SHOWS A TOO CASUAL BEHAVIOR IN TAKING CARE OF YOURSELF SOMETIMES. FOR VACCINATION THERE SHOULD BE A TRAINED PERSON, WHO CAN EVEN MONITOR THE PATIENT AFTER THE VACCINATION. SO IT SHOWS A LACK OF PROPER PROTOCOL IN THE INNER WORLD WHEN IT COMES TO MAKING YOURSELF SPIRITUALLY STRONG TO FACE THE ORDEALS OF LIFE. 23/07/2025, 11:20 ask right time | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/90646 2/4 THE VACCINE IS THE LIQUID, IS A MEDICINE WHICH ENHANCES IMMUNITY AGAINST A VIRUS. SO IF WE SEE THIS EQUATION, SOMETIMES THE SENSE OF COMMITMENT, A LITTLE ALERTNESS AND AWARENESS ARE NEEDED TO KEEP US PROTECTED FROM THE IMPACT OF THE ENVIRONMENT OUTSIDE US. BUT THIS COMMITMENT, AWARENESS, AND ALERTNESS ARE TO BE PRACTICED IN OUR INTIMACY FIRST, SO THAT WE CAN GIVE OURSELVES THE INNER MEDICINE WHICH HEALS OUR EMOTIONS, OUR MEMORIES. WE CAN DO THIS DURING MOMENT OF MEDITATIONS AND WITH THE ANGELICA MANTRA SO AS TO CONCENTRATE THE GOOD AND SPIRITUAL INTENTION WITHIN... , SO THAT GRADUALLY THE INNER VIRUSES CAN BE OVERCOME/TRANSCENDED... THE DREAM ASKS YOU TO PREPARE WELL AND CREATE AN INNER SENSE OF PROTECTION BEFORE LOOKING FOR ANOTHER JOB. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT THAT YOU CAN REFLECT ON WHAT KIND OF MEMORIES YOUR CURRENT JOB AWAKENS... WE KNOW THAT YOU ARE VERY SENSITIVE AND THIS DREAM IS SHOWING THAT A SLIGHT DOSE OF NEGATIVE CAN CREATE FEAR, REJECTION, WANTING TO FLEE NEGATIVITY, WANTING TO OVER-PROTECT YOURSELF... AND THESE STATES OF CONSCIOUSNESS ARE NOT NECESSARILY VISIBLE ON THE OUTSIDE... BUT YOU MIGHT FEEL IT IN YOUR EMOTIONS... And I want to ask about how to interpret a dream correctly. Because I think that it belongs to mood, emotion and results,... (something like that) to decide it is good (blue) or bad dream (red), then all the symbols on that dream will be interpreted as the same color. However, on the dream "Fighting with 2 sisters", Assistant Professor An said: it is a good dream, and I don't know why. There should be positive and negative symbols mixed in 1 dream, if that symbol is put in the right place? THANK YOU NHU FOR YOUR PROFOUND QUESTION... IT SHOWS HOW PROFOUNDLY YOU WOULD LIKE TO LEARN THE SYMBOLIC LANGUAGE AND ALL THE EFFORTS THAT YOU ARE PUTTING IN SO AS TO CHANGE AND TRANSFORM YOUR LIFE... BY SAYING THAT IT WAS A GOOD DREAM, IT IS TO EXPRESS HOW GOOD IT IS TO BE ABLE TO UNDERSTAND OUR MEMORIES WHETHER IT IS POSITIVE OR NEGATIVE... EVERY DREAM IS A GOOD DREAM FOR OUR SOUL, DEAR NHU... . EACH DREAM SHOWS US THE ASPECTS THAT WE NEED TO BE AWARE OF SO THAT WE CAN WORK UPON WITH GENTLENESS, PERSEVERANCE, AND A SENSE OF POWERFUL EFFORT... AND IN THE SUBTLETY OF LIFE AND DREAM, SOMETIMES THE POSITIVE AND NEGATIVE ASPECTS ARE MIXED TOGETHER... SO AT THAT MOMENT, IN YOUR DREAM JOURNAL YOU CAN NUANCE... IN YOUR DREAM YOU CAN SEE YOURSELF SPILL A GLASS BUT IF IN YOUR DREAM, YOU ARE STABLE AND BEING ABLE TO TIDY WITH A GOOD ENERGY IT MEANS THAT YOU ARE ABLE TO MANAGE THE EMOTION WITH CALMNESS EVEN THERE IS A SPILLED GLASS... AT THAT MOMENT, YOU CAN STILL PUT IN THE NEGATIVE SYMBOL BECAUSE OF THE SPILLED WATER BUT NUANCE IT, SAYING THAT EVEN THOUGH THE GLASS IS SPILLED, YOU WERE ABLE TO MANAGE THE "OVERFLOW" OF EMOTION... DEPENDING UPON THE TONE OF THE DREAM, THE SYMBOL CAN BE MINUS OR POSITIVE. FOR E.G HERE ADMINISTERING VACCINE IS NEGATIVE, WE NEED TO LOOK INTO THE MINUS ASPECT BECAUSE IT IS NOT ADMINISTERED IN THE RIGHT SPACE, CONTEXT, AND NOT WITH A GOOD INTENTION... (HAVING FEAR IN THE DREAM, FORCING OTHERS TO HAVE THE INJECTION, ETC.)... FOR EXAMPLE, YOU CAN SEE A VERY CALM SNAKE IN YOUR DREAM BUT IF IT IS IN A HOUSE, IT IS NOT AT THE RIGHT PLACE... SO IT BECOMES AUTOMATICALLY NEGATIVE... AND YOU WILL SEE WITH TIME AND PRACTICE, DEAR NHU, IT WILL BECOME EASIER FOR YOU TO DECODE YOUR DREAM... AND WE CAN SAY THAT SINCE THE BEGINNING OF THE YEAR, YOU HAVE IMPROVED SO PROFOUNDLY... WE ARE HAPPY TO WITNESS YOUR EVOLUTION YOU CAN CONGRATULATE YOURSELF FOR THIS YEAR! ANGELIC INTEGRATION OF THE UNDERSTANDING THAT EVIL IS EDUCATIONAL AND THAT YOU CAN TRANSFORM ANY NEGATIVE MEMORIES WITH LOVE AND WISDOM WITH MANAKEL ÂN

title_pdf: Coffee and Talk. last case id: C0204. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 27 May 2022 Angel: 36 Menadel Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello Professor ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I had no dreams this week while chanting Angel Menadel, and thanks to Menadel I have had time to reflect on the work I am doing and realize my connection with my physical Angel - Imamiah, recognizing my own errors and correcting them. OK, WE UNDERSTAND DEAR NHU... WE SEE THAT YOU HAVE SHARED A REAL LIFE INCIDENT... THIS IS A WONDERFUL IDEA... IT IS AN OPPORTUNITY FOR YOU TO DECODE YOUR CONCRETE LIFE SYMBOLICALLY... WE ARE HAPPY TO SEE YOU DOING IT SO WELL My job is about internal operations in the enterprise. I take care of setting up working procedures, setting standards for the work of each department, and guiding personnel to do the best work. And of course, while people work, there are always problems. And I am also the one who needs to see the problem, fix it and guide the staff to correct it. In particular, the companies I have worked with are all about technology products, so my operations are related to technology and engineering a lot. I understand that one of my important missions in this life is to fix the wrong codes in me - the living machine on the soul, individual level (physical, emotional, intellectual) and social level (family and work). WELL UNDERSTOOD :-)... AND IT IS ALWAYS THE ROLE OF A MANAGER... TO SOLVE PROBLEMS... AND WHEN WE SEE PROBLEMS IN AN EVOLUTIVE WAY, TO HELP US DEVELOP NEW QUALITIES, WE ALWAYS FIND A SOLUTION OR AN INSPIRATION TO FIND ANOTHER WAY 🌟 During this time, thanks to the angel Menadel, I was been activated some memories related to communication and management at work. I had a number of meetings to deal with process issues with my boss. And I have expressed disagreement with the solutions and ideas that the boss offers. At this time, I feel quite uncomfortable inside, I feel that I have a great negation with the ideas given by the boss, a feeling of imposition and inadequacy. I realized that the old patterns inside of me were very solid, they were hard to transform, so I need to listen more, be more patient and calmer. I also think these memories related to my leadership ability in previous lives, it tends to be repressive, aggressive, imposing, lack of empathy, and tolerance. Although later I realized that boss's opinions were not entirely true, he spoke with a very open, gentle and listening attitude. The problem is only on my side. YES... VERY GOOD... HERE YOU APPLIED RESONANCE AND REFERRED BACK TO YOURSELF INSTEAD OF BLAMING OTHERS ON THE OUTSIDE...WONDERFUL RECEPTIVITY IT IS NORMAL TO DISAGREE WITH OUR BOSS AT TIMES, AND IT IS PART OF THE TEAMWORK... BUT IF WE EXPRESS OUR OPINION WITHOUT GOING AGAINST THE OTHER PERSONALLY, JUST TO MAKE THE IDEA ADVANCE IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION, WITH A MENTALITY THAT THINKS MORE ABOUT THE TEAM, THEN A DISAGREEMENT CAN BECOME A GREAT EVOLUTIVE MOVEMENT... IT IS ALWAYS THE EGO THAT IS BEHIND THE UNCOMFORT OR A GREAT NEGATION... This week, I also had a small change in the way I work, more precisely the way our leadership team works. That is in the morning, the entire leader core will not work, but we gather together to exchange and talk about ideas and knowledge to develop the company in terms of strategy, also how to apply them to real work. And these sessions we will do at the cafe shops, where have open space to share comfortably. IT IS GOOD IDEA BECAUSE SOMETIMES PEOPLE OPEN UP WELL IN AN INFORMAL AMBIENCE... In the early sessions, the members went unevenly for some personal reasons, as well as the content in the shared stories also carried a lot of negative energy, I found myself not wanting to listen much, Although I am the main lead in these sessions. After the first 3 days, I realized that I refused a number of times to listen to people share, but I gave my opinion for people to follow. Then, today I thought and said to myself: these are the negative memories that resonate with me, please accept, understand myself, also them, and further transform myself, to listen more and empathize more. Today, I have adjusted the way I talk and listen, as well as give my suggestions to each person when they share, and also thank and give compliments when each person gives an opinion, whether it's bad or not. It might not be a good idea, but they all have good intentions to contribute to the joint operation, so I need to understand their intentions. GIVING COMPLIMENTS IS A VERY GOOD START DEAR NHU... HOWEVER, YOU CAN ALWAYS CHECK YOUR ENERGY... COMPLIMENTS SHOULD BE AUTHENTIC AND NOT TO IMPRESS OTHERS OR PLEASE THEIR EGO... IN YOUR SHARING YOU COMPLIMENTED PEOPLE EVEN WHEN THEIR IDEAS WERE NOT THAT GOOD... SO YES, YOU CAN STILL BE NON-JUDGEMENTAL AND RECEPTIVE/COMPASSIONATE TOWARDS THEM, YOU CAN ENCOURAGE AND INSPIRE THEM THAT 'OK IT IS A GOOD START, BUT LET US THINK OF SOMETHING MORE AS WELL'... SO THAT THEY ARE INSPIRED TO THINK, TO INNOVATE... Those are some things that I have come to realize and continue to work with myself with angel Menadel. Thank you WONDERFUL... THANK YOU FOR YOUR AUTHENTIC SHARING AND YOUR AMAZING EFFORTS TO APPLY THE KNOWLEDGE IN YOUR DAILY LIFE... WE WISH YOU ANGELIC EXPERIENCES AND RENEWAL OF CODES IMPRINTED IN YOUR SOUL WITH ANGELS MENADEL AND DANIEL ANGELIC REGARDS ALEXIS

    "dream_text": "Angel: 36 Menadel Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello Professor ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I had no dreams this week while chanting Angel Menadel, and thanks to Menadel I have had time to reflect on the work I am doing and realize my connection with my physical Angel - Imamiah, recognizing my own errors and correcting them. OK, WE UNDERSTAND DEAR NHU... WE SEE THAT YOU HAVE SHARED A REAL LIFE INCIDENT... THIS IS A WONDERFUL IDEA... IT IS AN OPPORTUNITY FOR YOU TO DECODE YOUR CONCRETE LIFE SYMBOLICALLY... WE ARE HAPPY TO SEE YOU DOING IT SO WELL My job is about internal operations in the enterprise. I take care of setting up working procedures, setting standards for the work of each department, and guiding personnel to do the best work. And of course, while people work, there are always problems. And I am also the one who needs to see the problem, fix it and guide the staff to correct it. In particular, the companies I have worked with are all about technology products, so my operations are related to technology and engineering a lot. I understand that one of my important missions in this life is to fix the wrong codes in me - the living machine on the soul, individual level (physical, emotional, intellectual) and social level (family and work). WELL UNDERSTOOD :-)... AND IT IS ALWAYS THE ROLE OF A MANAGER... TO SOLVE PROBLEMS... AND WHEN WE SEE PROBLEMS IN AN EVOLUTIVE WAY, TO HELP US DEVELOP NEW QUALITIES, WE ALWAYS FIND A SOLUTION OR AN INSPIRATION TO FIND ANOTHER WAY 🌟 During this time, thanks to the angel Menadel, I was been activated some memories related to communication and management at work. I had a number of meetings to deal with process issues with my boss. And I have expressed disagreement with the solutions and ideas that the boss offers. At this time, I feel quite uncomfortable inside, I feel that I have a great negation with the ideas given by the boss, a feeling of imposition and inadequacy. I realized that the old patterns inside of me were very solid, they were hard to transform, so I need to listen more, be more patient and calmer. I also think these memories related to my leadership ability in previous lives, it tends to be repressive, aggressive, imposing, lack of empathy, and tolerance. Although later I realized that boss's opinions were not entirely true, he spoke with a very open, gentle and listening attitude. The problem is only on my side. YES... VERY GOOD... HERE YOU APPLIED RESONANCE AND REFERRED BACK TO YOURSELF INSTEAD OF BLAMING OTHERS ON THE OUTSIDE...WONDERFUL RECEPTIVITY IT IS NORMAL TO DISAGREE WITH OUR BOSS AT TIMES, AND IT IS PART OF THE TEAMWORK... BUT IF WE EXPRESS OUR OPINION WITHOUT GOING AGAINST THE OTHER PERSONALLY, JUST TO MAKE THE IDEA ADVANCE IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION, WITH A MENTALITY THAT THINKS MORE ABOUT THE TEAM, THEN A DISAGREEMENT CAN BECOME A GREAT EVOLUTIVE MOVEMENT... IT IS ALWAYS THE EGO THAT IS BEHIND THE UNCOMFORT OR A GREAT NEGATION... This week, I also had a small change in the way I work, more precisely the way our leadership team works. That is in the morning, the entire leader core will not work, but we gather together to exchange and talk about ideas and knowledge to develop the company in terms of strategy, also how to apply them to real work. And these sessions we will do at the cafe shops, where have open space to share comfortably. IT IS GOOD IDEA BECAUSE SOMETIMES PEOPLE OPEN UP WELL IN AN INFORMAL AMBIENCE... In the early sessions, the members went unevenly for some personal reasons, as well as the content in the shared stories also carried a lot of negative energy, I found myself not wanting to listen much, Although I am the main lead in these sessions. After the first 3 days, I realized that I refused a number of times to listen to people share, but I gave my opinion for people to follow. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 19 August 2022 Angel: 29 Reiyel Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello Professor ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU Here is my dream: I am in my hometown. My father [- my origin masculine polarity. The minus is infidelity, lack of honesty, lack of recognition, lack of love ] drove me by car [- advance in the social level collectively. The minus is difficult advancing toward others, lack of respect and consideration for others ] to a high school friend's wedding [- community recognition of the couple's union. The minus is lack of recognition, the imbalance between two polarities, the improper fusion ] . Because I was busy with work, I told my friend in advance that I would be late. So when I arrived, the wedding was almost over. WELL CONNECTED DEAR NHU... YES THIS DREAM STARTS IN HOMETOWN AND ALSO YOU ARE WITH YOUR INNER FATHER... THIS DEPICTS THAT YOU CONNECTED WITH MEMORIES OF YOUR ORIGINS, ROOT CAUSE WHICH LEAD TO CERTAIN PATTERNS AND MEMORIES LIKE INFIDELITY, LACK OF HONESTY, AS YOU MENTIONED ETC. ... THIS IS ALSO RELATED TO THE SOCIAL DYNAMICS IN YOU... WHEN YOU ARRIVED, THE WEDDING WAS OVER AND YOU HAD INFORMED IN ADVANCE ABOUT YOUR WORK... THIS DEPICTS (ON THE MINUS) THAT SOMETIMES YOU CAN USE YOUR WORK AS A MEANS TO GAIN IMPORTANCE AND ATTENTION AMONGST YOUR SOCIAL CIRCLE, ASPECTS OF SUPERIORITY COMPLEX TO FEEL IMPORTANT & BUSY... DIFFICULTY TO BALANCE AND PRIORITIZE WELL YOUR WORK ASPECT VERSUS YOUR SOCIAL LEVEL... THE ENERGY THAT YOU RESONATE WITH YOUR INNER FATHER SYMBOL IS ACCOMPANYING YOU.... I.E. LACK OF AUTHENTICITY/HONESTY, LACK OF RECOGNITION ETC. SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THESE MEMORIES ARE RELATED TO BLOCKAGES WHICH CAN LIMIT YOU FROM ADVANCING TOWARDS YOUR INNER WEDDING (I.E. BALANCE OF POLARITIES) The first paragraph of the dream showed how I express on a social level to advance that having difficulty because I lacked inner and outer recognition. This is my old pattern from the memories of my lifetimes when I return to my inner home (hometown). The wedding was held on the beach [- laziness, desire to rest too much, difficulty in connecting emotions and actions, difficulty in actualizing, ESCAPISM ] and friends came in large numbers A HIGHER % OF NEGATIVE AFFINITIES TOWARDS THE ASPECTS MENTIONED ABOVE. Right now, everyone is having fun and taking selfies [- too much attachment to the past AND ALSO NOTIONS OF BEING SELF- CENTERED, A % OF BEING SELF-ABSORBED, living with the old pattern, difficulty in transforming and moving forward ] together. Then they got into a car. Perhaps people to about to leave. The other guests were still sitting outside. THESE ARE VARIOUS PERCENTAGES (MANY FRIENDS) IN YOU WHICH CAN SOMETIMES THINK A BIT TOO MUCH ABOUT SELF... THEY TAKE THEIR SELFIE AND THEN GET IN A CAR TO LEAVE EVEN WHEN IT SEEMS GUESTS ARE STILL THERE AND IT APPEARS THAT THE FUNCTION IS NOT YET OVER... DEAR NHU, WHILE REALISTICALLY IT IS ALSO OK TO TAKE SELFIES, HAVING FUN OR LEAVE AT DIFFERENT TIMES ( IT IS NOT NECESSARY TO ALWAYS WAIT FOR THE EVENT TO BE COMPLETED), BUT SYMBOLICALLY THIS NEEDS TO BE SEEN IN THE CONTEXT OF THE DREAM I tend to be lazy and want to live in the past, to avoid facing reality. ALSO PLEASE REFER TO THE COMMENTS ABOVE. I told my dad that I went to meet my friends for a while and then returned. I went into the car to greet everyone, and everyone seemed surprised, asking me why now I had just arrived. I said I was busy so I was late. TENDENCY TO SHOW THAT YOU ARE MOSTLY BUSY WHEN YOUR INNER FRIENDS ASK FOR THE REASON TO BE LATE... WHILE ONE WAY IT IS GOOD THAT YOU STILL MADE IT EVEN AFTER BEING BUSY BUT IN THIS DREAM THE ESSENCE IS THAT YOU SOMETIMES WANT TO BE THERE WITH THE GROUP/FRIENDS AND HAVE MOMENTS OF FUN/LAUGHTER ETC. BECAUSE IT IS NOT A COINCIDENCE IF YOU DIDN'T ATTEND TO THE WEDDING CEREMONY OF YOUR FRIEND, AND DON'T EVEN TALK TO HER OR CONGRATULATE HER FOR BEING MARRIED... IT SHOWS A FORM OF RETICENCE TO FUSE YOUR POLARITIES IN A WAY, AND BE TOO MUCH INTO THE WORKING / SOCIAL LIFE, WITHOUT GIVING ENOUGH ATTENTION AND IMPORTANCE TO THE COUPLE... AS IF YOU COULD UNCONSCIOUSLY REFUSE THE COUPLE / MARITAL LIFE AT TIMES BECAUSE YOU PRIORIZE WORK / SOCIAL LIFE TOO MUCH (ARRIVING IN THE END WHEN FRIENDS ARE TAKING SELFIES)... AND YOU CAN MAKE THE LINK HERE WITH YOUR FATHER LIVING INFIDELITIES... BECAUSE OF THE EXAMPLE OF YOUR PARENTS, YOU MAY HAVE RECORDED THAT THE COUPLE = DIFFICULTIES, PROBLEMS, AND THEN REFUSE IT NOW AT A CERTAIN %... BUT ALSO YOU WANT TO SEEK IMPORTANCE BY MAINTAINING A DISTANCE... THIS CAN SOMETIMES CREATE DUALITIES/CONFUSIONS IN YOU DER NHU... YOU CAN INTROSPECT ON THIS ASPECT I went down to the end of the car WE CAN NOTICE THIS THEME/PATTERN IN YOUR DREAMS. YOU ARE MOSTLY SEEN SITTING/STANDING A BIT AWAY OR FAR FROM OTHERS... EVEN HERE YOU WENT TO ONE END OF THE CAR. There are 2 laptops open [- my inner 2 polarities, my inner living computer. The open laptops represent my inner computer that has been working for a long time and needs to be shut down at the right time. The minus is the difficulty in resting at the right time and working effectively, sometimes tend to too fast, focus on result ] on the table, it seems to be working. THIS IS IN RELATION (NOTIONS OF 2) WITH YOUR COUPLE / RELATIONAL DIMENSION... THIS APPEARS BECAUSE OF THE MINUS OF THE WORK ASPECT IN YOU. (These are my 2 MacBooks, an old one I sold and a new one I'm currently using ON THE MINUS, MACBOOK CAN REPRESENT SHOW-OFF, SUPERIORITY COMPLEX, LUXURY, WANTING RECOGNITION ETC. IN THE WAY YOU CONNECT WITH OTHERS). I turned off the laptops and was about to take them away when a friend approached me and asked me: Are your laptops? I smiled and replied softly: ah that's right, I'll bring them back so I can handle the work. A CONTINUATION OF THE PATTERNS MENTIONED ABOVE... IN A SUBTLE WAY... THERE IS AN ESSENCE HERE THAT YOU LIKED THIS ATTENTION... YOU SMILED, MAINTAINED POISE BY REPLYING SOFTLY... A MOMENT TO SHOW THAT YOU ARE A BUSY AND WANTED TO HANDLE WORK WHILE SITTING IN A CAR WITH YOUR FRIENDS... ... She and I have talked about this issue, and she has gradually realized and is also gradually paying attention to the change. After I returned, I was infected with Covid and needed to take a few days off work to rest. The day before I found out I got Covid, I told a friend: I wish I had been sick for 2 weeks so I could rest. Lately, I really want to rest comfortably, and be able to last a few weeks without affecting anyone. But with the stagnant work situation caused by me, I was hesitant to ask my boss to take a break. She A PART OF YOU EMOTIONAL WORLD THAT is also a perfectionist, a bit rigid at times. I'm visiting her inner structure and intimacy. ] - an older sister who is also a DSSI student (I don't know this person, in fact, I temporarily named her)AN UNCONSCIOUS PART YOUR FEMININE ASPECT WHICH ALSO ASSOCIATED WITH KNOWLEDGE. I went to Jolie's bathroom [- represents purification. The minus points are difficulty in purification, accepting distortions, difficulty in understanding and applying knowledge WELL DECODED ] to take a shower. SO THE THEME OF THE DREAM SUGGESTS THAT YOU ARE CONNECTING WITH UNCONSCIOUS AFFINITIES IN YOUR WORLD OF EMOTIONS, THE WAY YOU FEEL (FEMININE ASPECT) WHILE WORKING ON YOURSELF SPIRITUALLY (BEING IN DSSI KNOWLEDGE) BEING IN THE ENERGY OF YOUR INNER JOLIE (DECODED ABOVE)... AND AT THE SAME TIME HERE IT IS NOT LOGICAL THAT YOU GO TO SOMEONE'S HOUSE TO TAKE A SHOWER HERE... OF COURSE WE CAN IMAGINE THAT THE PERSON HOSTS YOU AND YOU TAKE A SHOWER AT NIGHT IF YOU STAY AT THEIR PLACE, BUT HERE IN THE CONTEXT IT SHOWS MEMORIES THAT COULD DEPEND ON OTHERS TOO MUCH TO FEEL PURIFIED... AS IF YOU COULD USE THE RELATIONAL LEVEL TO FEEL REPLENISHED, RELAXED AND CLEANSED AT TIMES... BUT MIXING WITH NEEDS FOR EMOTIONAL WARMTH THAT CAN BE DIFFICULT TO CONNECT FROM WITHIN... WANTING TO CONNECT WITH THE INTIMACY OF THE OTHER PERSON TO FEEL NOURISHED EMOTIONALLY, BUT DEVELOPING AN INVASIVE % AT THE SAME TIME... Jolie stood at the door REPRESENTS A PATH WAY, ENTRANCE INTO A STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS...IN THIS DREAM YOU ARE ENTERING IN A STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS RELATED TO YOUR INNER JOLIE talking about her previous meeting with me at the airport [- represents preparation at the thought level in advancing on the social level. Minus points are difficulty in preparation, too much thinking, difficulty in actualizing, too theoretical ALSO DIFFICULTY IN MOVING FROM ONE STATE OF CONSCIOUSNESS TO ANOTHER, LACK OF DISCERNMENT, TRIGGER OF NEEDS WHILE BEING IN ENERGY OF INNER JOLIE ] . Jolie described what she was wearing, but I still can't remember for sure, I remember vaguely THIS MEMORY OR PATTERN OF INNER JOLIE IS TRYING TO REMIND ITSELF OR GET ACTIVATED IN YOU...REMINDING YOU ABOUT THE JOLIE SYMBOL INSIDE OF YOU...NOT BEING ABLE TO REMEMBER MEANS IT IS UNCONSCIOUSLY HIDDEN AND NOT YET CLEANSED OR TRANSFORMED. Then Jolie instructed me to use the bathroom, ALSO SOMETIMES YOUR INNER JOLIE CAN INVADE OR LET OTHERS INVADE HER INTIMACY, BECAUSE IT IS NOT LOGICAL TO WELCOME SOMEONE IN YOUR HOUSE TO MAKE THEM TAKE A SHOWER... SO THIS SHOWS TOO MUCH KINDNESS, OPENING TO OTHERS AT TIMES, BECAUSE OF NEEDS FOR EMOTIONAL CLOSENESS WITH THE PERSON... she guided me very carefully about how to use it, and where to put the necessary items. I find Jolie's bathroom convenient and sufficient. Jolie's house YOUR INNER STRUCTURE looks very airy, with lots of glass, surrounded by trees and flowers [- Glass represents protection, shielding with proper acceptance (transparent) ON THE MINUS IT CAN MEAN FRAGILITY, FOCUS ON APPEARANCE WHICH SOMETIMES MIGHT NOT BE SO USEFUL OR NEEDED, LACK OF TRANSPERANCY, ILLUSORY ASPECTS. Trees and flowers belong to the emotional world. The minus point of Jolie's house is that she is too open-minded, too emotional, lack inner protection, proper secrecy, and sometimes she may have too much sympathy for unlucky people, emotional dependence AND THIS IS WHAT SHE DID WITH YOU HERE IN THE DREAM... IT IS NOT LOGICAL TO WELCOME SOMEONE TO MAKE HIM TAKE A SHOWER... THIS SHOWS THE ASPECT OF HAVING TOO MUCH SYMPATHY FOR OTHERS, CREATING AN EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCY IN THEM (MAKE THEM FEEL PURIFIED BUT IN A WAY THAT IS NOT RIGHT, BECAUSE THEY INVADE HER PERSONAL SPACE)... AND YOU COULD BE LIKE HER AT A CERTAIN %... ] . I held a glass of guava juice [- represents the replenishment and regeneration of energy on an emotional level. Minus points are difficulty in creating energy for myself, difficulty in regulating emotions, emotional dependence, lack of tenderness, receptivity ] that she invited me out with.THE ABOVE DISTRACTIONS SOMETIMES CREATE EMOTIONAL LACKS IN YOU WHICH SEEK REPLENISHMENT...TENDENCY TO COMPENSATE FOR THE INNER LACKS EXTERNALLY...TAKING YOUR ATTENTION AWAY FROM THE PURIFICATION PROCESS YOU CONTINUE TO GO DEEPER AND REMAIN CONNECTED WITH THE ASPECTS RELATED TO NEEDS, DISTRACTIONS ETC. TENDENCY TO BE SELF CENTERED OWING TO NOTIONS OF EMISSIVITY, displaying many flower pots, especially purple flowers, very long and beautiful [- represents fidelity in a relationship DISCERNMENT IN YOUR FEELINGS. AND MANY FLOWERS ON THE TABLE IN THE NEGATIVE SHOWS TOO MUCH NEEDS TO SHARE BEAUTIFUL FEELINGS WITH OTHERS... LIKE WHEN INVITING SOMEONE TO TAKE A SHOWER... IT IS CONNECTING THEM TOO MUCH WITH YOUR PERSONAL INTIMACY... ] . The table top is assembled by many bricks, below is the soil. Sometimes I just want to tell everyone that I want to be alone. I struggled a lot inside and it drained me a lot of energy. I don't know how to adjust properly, but even if I'm alone in this situation, I still find myself unable to concentrate. to understand, recognize, and transform physical distortions and difficulties, and in memories. IT IS PERFECTLY FINE TO BE WITH SELF AND HARMONIZE YOUR ENERGY BUT ALSO IT IS IMPORTANT TO BE BALANCED AND INCARNATED IN MATTER SO THAT YOU DO NOT BECOME TOO AIRY. title_pdf: Move to part-time position. last case id: C0216. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 14 October 2022 Angel: 35 Chavakhiah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello Professor ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I don't remember any dreams this week, so I'll analyze the week's events. OK As I shared with you before, I have resigned from my current company. And last week, my boss [- a part of my masculine polarity, lack of assertiveness, lack of recognition, stubbornness, high self- esteem, too attached to responsibility, lack of inner wealth, there are many karmic consequences related to abundance, want to get rich quick ] made an appointment to talk to me. We talk freely in a cafe [- represents communication at the social level, the minus is difficulty in listening, receptive and communicating at the social level ] . I want to stop, change the way I construct and move forward in society to start a new path. However, I have difficulty receiving the distortions of my inner boss, difficulty communicating with myself to learn and transform. So, my resignation shows the wrong end when the distortions have not been properly understood and transformed. At first, we talked about health [- difficulty in self-observation to recognize physical and mental health problems, difficulty accepting treatments and understanding health problems, lack of understanding of the law of karma ] . My boss advised me to go for a check-up and exercise [- having problems related to masculine energy, difficulties in emissivity, acting, materializing ] . After that, we talked about the economic situation in the country and the world , the inflation situation, and the economic recession that will affect the next 1-2 years. A signal from the universe told me to go back inner to take care of my mental health and improve my materialization. Because in the email I sent to my boss I said that I was stressed and this affected my work efficiency. YES... IT WAS A WAY TO OPEN THE CONVERSATION... AND SYMBOLICALLY HE WAS BEHAVING LIKE A FATHER, WANTING TO TAKE CARE OF YOU BY TALKING ABOUT YOUR HEALTH... AND TALKING ABOUT THE ECONOMIC RECESSION WAS ALSO A SIGN FOR YOU, BECAUSE YOU ARE ALSO LIVING A "RECESSION" IN TERMS OF WORK ACTIVITY AFTER QUITTING... AND IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU REPLACE THIS MOVEMENT IN YOUR LIFE ON THE RIGHT TRACK NOW... Finally, my boss talked to me about work. As in the content of the email, I have given 2 options, either give me a quit or move to a more suitable position. And I suggested quitting. However, my boss told me to move to a part-time job [- difficulty in understanding and learning lessons at work, need to correct my intentions to be right at work, in the way I construct, develop myself and move forward in society ] managing a project. I was a bit surprised because I expected to quit or move to another position but still work full-time. Because if I work part-time, I will definitely have to find another job to cover my monthly living expenses. And I don't want that, I hope to be able to focus entirely on one job. This show a high ego, too much masculine energy, and a lack of receptivity caused me to give 2 options for my boss to choose, from while the boss should have been the one to decide and discuss with me. Changing to a part-time position shows that I need to learn more lessons about receptivity, being too stubborn, having too many ideas, lacking materialization. WHILE IT IS OK TO SOMETIMES TAKE IT EASY OR PLAN YOUR WORK BETTER, BUT IT IS ALSO IMPORTANT FOR YOU TO BE PRACTICAL AND PRAGMATIC ABOUT IT DEAR NHU... RESIGNING FROM A JOB WITHOUT HAVING ANY OTHER JOB OPPORTUNITY IN YOUR HAND MIGHT NOT BE A GOOD DECISION... AND SHOW THAT YOU COULD HAVE BEEN ALSO TOO MUCH IN A FORM OF EGO, DRASTIC/EXTREME IN THE POSSIBILITIES FOR IMPROVEMENTS... THE SHARING ABOVE SHOWS A BIT OF DUALITY IN YOU... ON ONE HAND YOU INITIATED YOUR RESIGNATION AND ON THE OTHER HAND YOU ARE ALSO WORRIED ABOUT MANAGING EXPENSES... WHICH IS NORMAL TO TAKE CARE OF, OF COURSE... AT LEADERSHIP LEVEL THEY ARE GENERALLY GOOD IN UNDERSTANDING PEOPLE AND EMOTIONS...INSTEAD OF WRITING AN EMAIL IT WOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER TO FIRST HAVE A DISCUSSION WITH YOUR BOSS... YOU COULD HAVE SEEKED GUIDANCE FROM HIM... IT SEEMS THAT OWING TO YOUR INTERNAL CONFUSION AND PRESSURE YOU TOOK A RASH DECISION... EVEN THOUGH, YOU DON'T LIKE THE JOB BUT IT IS STILL IMPORTANT FOR YOU... TO MAINTAIN YOUR LIVING EXPENSES... YOU COULD HAVE TRANSITIONED TO SOME OTHER ROLE OR JOB (WHICH YOU LIKE) GRADUALLY.... BY PATIENTLY SEARCHING FOR IT AND TILL THEN YOU COULD HAVE CONTINUED WITH THE CURRENT JOB... IF THERE WAS STRESS BOTHERING YOU... YOU COULD HAVE RAISED THAT CONCERN WITH YOUR BOSS...THE ABOVE BEHAVIOR MAY HAVE GIVEN AN IMPRESSION THAT YOU ARE BEING TOO REACTIVE IN YOUR APPROACH... However, at that time, I thought that maybe I was affected by the post-covid so I was still a bit tired, my mind was a bit hazy, and I really didn't have any plans for the future. Though I do not have too much money to take a long break. So then I agreed. I decided to give it up to have some time to rest. So far, I still feel confused. I feel like I'm not ready for this break, it's like a rash decision to follow reason. I have talked to myself: I know my action comes from being too attached to responsibilities, being too harsh on myself, and at the same time it comes from being a high ego when I want to suggest quitting before my boss made a clear decision because I didn't want to be the passive recipient of that decision. ALSO IN AN UNCONSCIOUS SUBTLE WAY... THIS ALSO APPEARS TO BE A WAY FOR YOU TO ESCAPE FROM YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES AND DIFFICULTIES IN A %...YES IT IS IMPORTANT TO BALANCE WORK AND LIFE BUT IT IS ALSO IMPORTANT TO BE PRACTICAL IN YOUR DECISION MAKING... YOU COULD HAVE QUESTIONED YOURSELF - WAS THERE NO OTHER WAY APART FROM RESIGNING TO HANDLE YOUR CHALLENGES? And the fact that, when the decision was issued company-wide, people completely did not know why I was in a high management position, working full-time and being transferred to a part-time position and managing a small project. Outsiders would probably think this was a punishment. And after giving it out, everyone was surprised and asked me. But I also don't want to say why. AND AT THE SAME TIME YOU DON'T HAVE TO EXPLAIN EVERYTHING TO EVERYONE IN DETAILS... AND SIMPLY SAY THAT YOU WANTED TO EXPERIMENT SOMETHING ELSE... IT IS BETTER NOT TO ENTER IN TOO MUCH EXPLANATION IN THIESE MOMENTS... AND IT IS OK SOMETIMES TO TONE DOWN THE WORKLOAD SO AS TO DEAL WITH ISSUES IN A BALANCED WAY... BUT IT SHOULD BE DONE IN AN ANGELIC AND PROGRESSIVE WAY...IF YOU HAD ASKED FOR GUIDANCE WITHOUT RESIGNING... MAYBE YOU COULD HAVE GOT THE SAME OPTION (AS GIVEN BY YOUR BOSS NOW) TO GIVE YOU A BREATHER... SO THAT YOU CAN RECHARGE YOUR BATTERIES AND TAKE MORE RESPONSIBILITIES AGAIN...THEN IT WOULD HAVE BEEN A GRACIOUS AND NICE WAY TO TRANSITION TO THE NEW PART-TIME ROLE WITHOUT CREATING ANY RIPPLES. WE FEEL, YOUR BOSS WAS BEING KIND TO NOT LET YOU GO AND INSTEAD SHOWED GOOD EMPATHY BY OFFERING A PART-TIME JOB... IN TODAY'S COMPETITIVE WORLD, IT IS NORMAL FOR COMPANIES TO LET GO SOME PEOPLE AND REPLACE THEM WITH FRESH TALENT OR OUTSOURCE SUCH ROLES TO OTHERS... INSTEAD HE RECOGNIZED YOUR QUALITES AND CAPABILITIES AND WAS ABLE TO RETAIN YOU BY OFFERING A PART-TIME PROJECT... THIS WAY HE IS GIVING YOU TIME TO BALANCE YOURSELF AND FIND ANOTHER JOB WITHOUT LOSING ALL YOUR EXPENSES... WHICH IS A WONDERFUL THING AND SOMETHING TO BE GRATEFUL FOR Besides me, there were also personnel adjustments in 2 other positions [- these are 2 girls, so they are parts of my feminine energy. I show I had adjusted a little the way I recept ] , which are personnel in my team, and these two were proposed and handled by me before finishing full-time work. The reason I left the company was because I wanted to stop, I realized that I did this job just for the money, but while I personally thought the job industry, the boss's way of thinking and everyone was not suitable for me. The fact that they do blockchain, launches a lot of projects just for money without bringing a real value to the community or yes but it hasn't become reality. At the same time, in the current environment and colleagues do not have much expertise and they only need to do things that have been done for a long time, even they do not understand too much about this blockchain industry. So when working with them, I find myself being dissolved, not learning more about skills or professional knowledge, but also being dragged into an unscientific way of working. And I cannot afford to drag them along even though I'm their leader. I also realized that I did not do the right thing.WE UNDERSTAND THAT DEAR NHU AND IN THE LONG TERM IT IS OK TO THINK LIKE THIS. HOWEVER, YOU ALSO NEED TO BE LOOK AT THE SITUATION PRACTICALLY... MOST OF THESE HAVE NOT YET BEEN PRACTICALLY IMPLEMEMNTED BECAUSE OF CERTAIN LIMITATIONS... AND IT ATTRACTS ALSO A LOT OF PEOPLE WANTING TO GET FAST MONEY WITH CRYPTOS.... WITHOUT DEEP UNDERSTANDING OF THEIR MECHANISMS.... SO YOU SEE, IN WHICHEVER COMPANY YOU WORK WITH, WHEN IT COMES TO BLOCKCHAIN... I couldn't remember dreams, so I will analyze some events that happen this week. I met a friend - Thu [- a part of my feminine , she is too simple, too rational and thinks logically, emotional dependencies, high ego, superiority complex, need to be recognized, lacks understanding of the law of resonance and the law of karma, tendency to manipulate the psychology of others ] . She flew from another city to Ho Chi Minh City for business travel. Thu told me about the trouble of her with her girlfriend - Tram [- a part of my feminine, she thinks too much, superiority and inferiority complex, too many material needs, need to recognition, lack inner love, too attached to responsibilities, high ego, tend to pressure put perspective, perfectionist, lazy, tend to want to live the life of a hermit, run away ] , especially, Tram got medicine for depression a few years ago. Tram also overthinking like me. It's hard to make decisions or actions because she is stuck with thoughts about everything around the job like risk, how, result, why,... Tram compares herself to others. She wants to do the jobs that she loves, but she can't do them because there aren't so many chances in her hometown. When doing other jobs, she feels unsatisfied and she has frank, childish thoughts when talking to her boss. She is afraid to leave her hometown to go to the big city where there are more job opportunities. She always wondered why there are so many people who can both do what they love and earn enough money to support themselves and live the way they want. Therefore, now she's been out of school for a few years but still can't support herself. She is still dependent on her family. This caused her to put a lot of pressure on herself. I've noticed that she often overstates the issue, and I've noticed that often people who have a lot of thoughts that cause depression have a lot of thoughts, most of them negative. In those thoughts, there are logical and illogical things, but all are possible. THE UNIVERSE HAS ARRANGED FOR YOU TO MEET YOUR OWN RESONANCE, DEAR NHU... HAS NOT BEEN REVEALED... HOWEVER IN THE CONTEXT OF WHAT YOU HAVE SHARED WE SHALL CONSIDER THE MINUS ASPECTS OF THE SYMBOLS PRESENTED... AT THE START IT SHOWS THAT YOU SOMETIMES HAVE A TENDENCY TO HIDE YOUR TRUE SELF (DISGUISE) FROM OTHERS... IN A % YOU WISH TO REMAIN HIDDEN SO THAT YOU CAN INVESTIGATE I.E. BECAUSE BEHIND THE TOO MUCH, THERE IS THE NOT ENOUGH... SO IF YOU HIDE TOO MUCH, THERE ARE ALSO MEMORIES THAT COULD OPEN YOURSELF TOO MUCH TO OTHERS... SO YOU CAN CONTINUE TO FIND THE BALANCE ☯️ TO ACCEPT WHAT IS HIDDEN IN YOURSELF AND OTHERS, AND HAVE THE RIGHT TRANSPARENCY AND AUTHENTICITY WITH EVERYONE ✨ A WONDERFUL DREAM RELATED YOUR WORK MEMORIES DEAR NHU... WE WISH YOU A WONDERFUL UNDERSTANDING OF TEAM DYNAMICS, COMPASSION AND EMPATHY TOWARDS YOURSELF AND OTHERS WITH ANGELS MENADEL AND HAZIEL ANGELIC REGARDS ALEXIS
