title_pdf: Da Nang trip. last case id: C0220. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 11 November 2022 Angel: 45 Sealiah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello Professor ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU After the meeting with you, I decided to chant Sealiah with the intention: please help me know what has blocked me from enthusiasm for work in recent years. OK, A GOOD INITIATIVE... :) I have no dreams, so I decode some events in week. Last week I had a few outings to relax. So far, it was time for me to find a job, but I felt that my mood was just letting go of the old job, and now it was comfortable resting. So, although finding a new job is also urgent, I still decided to take a trip for myself. I went to Da Nang, a city with the sea and mountains. I seek to find a balance between emotion (sea) and action (mountain). I need time to balance my inner struggles to focus on external realization (work). IT IS A GOOD IDEA SOMETIMES TO TAKE AN INTERMISSION, RECHARGE YOUR BATTERIES BEFORE GETTING BACK IN ACTION... Before I boarded the plane, my glasses' base [- My global vision is broken, it can be seen that I am currently not in the mood and clearly conscious to identify the situation, I am driven by inspiration but lack of reason. I have a hard time getting a global of the situation, taking the right course of action ] accidentally fell off A GOOD ANALYSIS AND INTROSPECTION... THERE ARE NO ACCIDENTS DEAR NHU... THE SIGN WAS TO CORRECT YOUR VISION WITH RESPECT TO HOW YOU PERCIEVE OR SEE THINGS AROUND YOU...BASE ALSO PROVIDES SOLIDITY, SUPPORT...WHICH CURRENTLY EVEN FOR YOU DOES NOT APPEAR TO BE STABLE ENOUGH MATERIALLY...ONCE YOUR WAY OF LOOKING AT THINGS CHANGES, THIS WILL TRIGGER TRANSFORMATION IN YOUR CONCRETE REALITY AS WELL . I still decided to wear the glasses and leave immediately because I didn't have time to fix them anymore. The days in Da Nang are really beautiful and sunny, a little chilly. When I was invited by Thu [- a part of my feminine polarity, she is generous, kind, simple in thought, clear in action, neat. Her minus points are lack of empathy, lack of insight, emotional dependence, lack of recognition. She is a lawyer. From her job, I recognize a part of the reason I met her, because I need to work with my inner justice, I need to be more rigorously, right, disciplined and consistent ] to Da Nang to play, I didn't know that she had just quit her job and had a few free days in Da Nang to hang out. Thu let me stay and take me out, I also met a few other friends in Da Nang, they also took me out and I had very comfortable conversations. I really feel that this trip is very right and is loved and supported by some friends, so I don't spend too much. I get to visit some natural scenes and see the sea, and trees, I feel they are very beautiful, even sometimes they make me emotional. The universe has arranged for me people and natural scenes with good qualities to love me, help me balance, heal, and help me to be at peace when I have time to turn inside to talk to myself. YOU FEEL AT EASE WHEN PARTS OF YOU SYMBOLIZING SUPPORT, ACCOMPANIEMENT, EMOTIONAL CONNECT ETC. GET ACTIVATED... AND OF COURSE IF IT HELPED YOU TO RELAX, SPEND A GOOD MOMENT OF REFLEXION IT IS WONDERFUL... BUT HERE YOU CAN OBSERVE YOUR INTENTION IN GOING TO THIS TRIP... BECAUSE IF YOU JUST HANG OUT WITH FRIENDS WITHOUT THINKING DEEPLY ABOUT YOUR SITUATION, IT IS AS IF YOU DIDN'T WANT TO SEE IT ANYMORE... THIS IS WHY YOUR GLASSES WERE BROKEN JUST BEFORE THE TRIP... TO INVITE YOU NOT TO LOOSE YOUR CONCRETE REALITY FROM SIGHT... ✨ From Da Nang, I flew back to my hometown to visit my parents. I did not stay with my parents for long, because it was quite cold in the early winter, and my body was very cold. When I got home, I was going to tell my parents about my transition to part-time, but I felt like I didn't want them to worry, and then I would find a job again soon, so I decided not to. I lack of honesty with myself, I tend to avoid, avoid, and choose a gentle solution but it does not solve the problem in the long term, but only temporarily. At the same time, I also lacked of faith in myself, or trust in my parents when I was afraid to tell this truth. ALSO THE LACK OF WARMTH WITH YOUR FAMILY RESONATED WITH THE COLD WEATHER ON THE OUTSIDE...WHILE IT IS OK TO NOT TRIGGER WORRY OR SADNESS FOR OTHERS BUT PERHAPS YOU COULD HAVE SHARED IT WITH GENTLENES, DIPLOMACY AND YET WITH AFFIRMATION... HERE ALSO IT WAS THE ESSENCE OF ESCAPING THAT LESSENED YOUR AUTHENTICITY/HONESTY WITH YOUR PARENTS...YOU COULD HAVE SAID FOR E.G "THAT THE JOB WAS TAKING A LOT OUT OF ME AND WAS NOT HELPING ME TO GROW OR DO WHAT I AIM FOR PROFESSIONALLY... I PLAN TO TAKE FEW CLASSES TO UPGRADE MY SKILLS AND HENCE CHANGED TO PART TIME ARRANGEMENT WITH THE SAME COMPANY. IN PARALLEL I AM LOOKING OUT FOR A NEW OPPORTUNITY AS WELL" ETC.... IF YOU PUT IT RIGHTLY WITH PURITY OF INTENTION (WHICH IS ALSO A QUALITY OF ANGEL SEALIAH) THEY MIGHT BECOME RECEPTIVE... THEY MIGHT EVEN HELP OR SUPPORT YOU TILL YOU GET STABILITY... IT IS OK TO ASK FOR SUPPORT DEAR NHU WHEN YOU REALLY NEED IT :) When I got back to Saigon, the first day I took the motorbike PERSONAL ADVANCEMENT out, the behind tire deflated [- The behind tire represents the driving force moving forward in society. This shows that I need to renew myself, build up more motivation, and renew motivation, refresh my work to have the right and surer progress. And I'm in the process of renewing myself ALSO PAST MEMORIES/PATTERNS (BACK) RELATED TO LACK OF WILLPOWER AND MOTIVATION IN YOUR THOUGHTS BECAUSE TYRE IS FILLED WITH AIR I.E. THOUGHTS ] , and I had to change to a new one. GOOD SO YOU UPGRADED TO A NEW TYRE... SIMILARLY YOU CAN UPGRADE YOUR THOUGHTS TO NEW LEVEL BY CONTINUING TO WORK WITH ANGEL SEALIAH TO UPGRADE YOUR MOTIVATION TO ADVANCE 😇🍀 Family or parents are also a root part of my motivation to move forward in my society, so when I lacked this honesty, I also caused myself to continue to lack motivation to rise up, it also does not generate real enthusiasm at work. title_pdf: My adoptive mother. last case id: C0221. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 25 November 2022 Angel: 35 Chavakhiah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello Professor , ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I chanted Angel Chavakhiah with the intention: please help me change my relationship with my sister better. OK THIS IS A WONDERFUL INTENTION TO DISCOVER THE INNER SUPPORT, AFFINITIES IN YOUR EMOTIONAL ASPECT... I'm looking for someone to move into an empty room in my rented apartment [- a part of my intimate world, a part of my feminine polarity. The symbol shows that I am in a state of lack of receptivity and lack of inner emotion because in the apartment I am living in, all are female. Previously, that room was occupied by men, and after they moved out, we decided to rent it out to women. This shows that I am in need of increased inner receptivity ] YES WELL DISCERNED... AND AT THE SAME TIME IT IS GOOD TO BE WITH PEOPLE YOU TRUST IF THEY ARE LIVING WITH YOU IN THE SAME APARTMENT... THIS PART OF THE DREAM SUGGESTS YOUR SOUL IS INVITING YOU TO CONNECT WITH ASPECTS RELATED TO YOUR RECEPTIVITY, EMOTIONS (FEMININE) ETC... SO THE INNER ROOM WHICH WAS EARLIER EMPTY (I.E. IN A WAY YOU WERE NOT CONNECTED WITH IT AS YOU INNER HIDDEN SYMBOLS WERE NOT YET REVEALED)... IS NOW BEING SHOWN... A % OF YOU, ESSENCES AS REFLECTED BY THE SYMBOL OF MS. HANH IS NOW GETTING KNOWN TO YOU OR GETTING ACTIVATED WITHIN YOU. Ms. Hanh [- a part of my feminine polarity. She is a generous, enthusiastic, kind, responsible, hardworking, and industrious woman. She is also a person who is too responsible, too gentle, sacrifices too much, tends to please everyone, worries about her children too much, emotional dependency on her children. In the reality, I don't really close to her and know much about her I.E. A PART OF YOU WHICH CAN SOMETIMES CAN GET TOO MUCH IN THE ENERGY OF PLEASING, IMPRESSING OTHERS, BEING TOO GENTLE AND GOING OUT OF THE WAY FOR OTHERS ETC.... THIS IS DUE TO MEMORIES OF LACK OF LOVE AND ACKNOWLEDGEMENT...SOMETIMES THE HELPING AND CARING NATURE IN YOU CAN GET A BIT MIXED UP OWING TO THESE INNER LACKS ] moved in. Everyone works all day, so we rarely meet each other. A VERY SUBTLE EXPRESSION IN THE DREAM TELLING YOU THAT SOMETIMES DUE TO EXCESSIVE FOCUS ON WORK/MATTER YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO CONNECT AND TRANSFORM THE MINUS OF YOUR INNER MS. HANH One evening, I saw Hanh return, and I found her tired. I asked her: I see you seem busy or sad these days. THIS IS A GOOD IMPROVEMENT IN YOUR EMPATHY AND RECEPTIVITY DEAR NHU... YOUR INNER MS. HANH NEEDED HELP WHICH YOU COULD FEEL AND TOOK THE RIGHT STEPS TO CONNECT AND TEND TO THIS PART OF YOU INSTED OF IGNORING OR SUPPRESSING IT ... HOWEVER, ANOTHER THING TO NOTE IS THAT EVEN THOUGH SHE WAS TIRED AND SAD, SHE DID NOT COME TO YOU HERSELF FOR SHARING, HELP, COMFORT, GUIDANCE ETC.... THIS MEANS SOMETIMES YOU CAN ALSO HESITATE TAKING HELP FROM OTHERS WHEN NEEDED LEADING TO SUPPRESSIONS... Suddenly she came to hug [- represents protection and refuge. She THIS PART OF YOU is in need of WARMTH, POSITIVE AFFINITIES, SUPPORT, protection, and refuge from those around her, showing her lack of inner faith, lack of ability to protect herself, lack of inner love BUT IT IS ALSO OK DEAR NHU TO SEEK HELP AND SUPPORT WHEN ONE IS IN GRIEF AND HELPLESSNESS ] me, put her head on my shoulder IN A WAY THIS PART OF YOU IS LOOKING FOR SUPPORT AND NEEDS HELP IN TAKING RIGHT RESPONSIBILITY TO BALANCE AND EASE YOUR SAD, NEGATIVE AND DISTURBING THOUGHTS and she said: I am very sad these days because my mother [- a part of my feminine polarity. Her mother is also my adoptive mother in real life OK, HOWEVER WE SHALL DECODE THIS AS MOTHER SYMBOL I.E. YOUR FEMININE POLARITIES, NOTIONS OF MEMORIES OF ORIGIN (ROOT CAUSE) RELATED TO THE ABOVE ASPECTS. I'm not too close to my adoptive mother in real life either, so I don't know much about her. She is a tolerant, gentle, diligent person who endures all hardships to raise her children, ready to support her children in everything. I find myself aloof from my relatives, I don't have much contact with them but only socialize. This shows that I have a complex of inferiority, lack of inner love. It will create an imbalance because of the compensatory mechanism, because with relatives I am not too close, so I tend to care about friends, or strangers too much to make up for the care I haven't been able to send to my loved ones YES YOU ARE GETTING INTUITIVE DEAR NHU ...SO YOU SEE BECAUSE OF MULTIPLE REASONS AND YOUR PATTERNS OF CREATING DISTANCE (AS SHOWN IN YOUR EARLIER DREAMS) YOU CAN SOMETIMES FEEL ALOOF, LACK OF SUPPORT & PROTECTION...THERE BY DIMINISHING THE QUALITIES OF INNER ADOPTIVE MOTHER - GENTLE, CARING, DILIGENT ETC... THIS DISTANCE ALSO LEADS TO MISUNDERSTANDING AND NOTIONS OF ASSUMING THINGS... ITS LIKE FOR E.G. WHEN PEOPLE ARE NOT CONNECTED WITH EACH OTHER BUT GET TO KNOW ABOUT SOMETHING THROUGH OTHER PEOPLE, OR SOCIAL MEDIA ETC... THIS SOMETIMES TRIGGERS (DEPENDING ON THE CASE) - JEALOUSY, INFERIORITY, EGO ETC... FEELINGS OF NOSTALGIA, LACK OF LOVE, SUPPORT CAN ALSO GET TRIGGERED... PERHAPS ITS A CALL FOR YOU TO NOT CREATE SUCH DISTANCES ANYMORE... IT IS ALWAYS GOOD TO STAY CONNECTED, CORDIAL WITH PEOPLE WHEN NATURALLY POSSIBLE WITH BALANCE (WITHOUT ANY NEED OF DEPENDENCY ETC.) ] is sick these days. My mother is very weak, she has not been able to eat and drink much, and these days she can only eat and drink by infusion into the body. BLOCKAGES IN NOURISHMENT LEADING DRAINAGE OF ENERGY THEREBY LEADING TO NEED FOR EXTERNAL SUPPORT TO SUSTAIN WELL... THIS BLOCKAGE CAN ALSO BE RELATED TO ENERGETIC NOURISHMENT (I.E. WHEN DUE TO DISTANCES, RESISTANCE IN TAKING HELP YOU CAN SOMETIMES STOP YOURSELF FROM RECIEVING HELP, CARE AND SUPPORT FROM OTHERS)... AND IT IS BEAUTIFUL AT THE SAME TIME THAT SHE CONFESSES TO YOU AFTER YOU ASK WHAT'S GOING ON... IT SHOWS YOU ARE OPENING TO MORE EMPATHY AND RECEPTIVITY AND THAT IS A GOOD SIGN DEAR INITIATE 😇 I was also very worried when I heard that, I asked more about her mother. I asked her if she had free time to visit her mother with me that day. At first, she said she was free, but then she was busy. THIS IS AN INTERESTING ANGLE THAT HAS BEEN SHOWN IN THE DREAM... ON ONE SIDE YOUR INNER HANH IS VERY CONCERNED AND SAD FOR HER MOTHER BUT STILL SOMETIMES IT IS NOT THE PRIORITY... TENDENCY OF GETTING TOO BUSY SO AS TO ESCAPE FROM DIFFICULTIES AND NOT WANTING TO TOUCH UPON SENSITIVE ASPECTS WITH THE FEAR OF TRIGERRING NEGATIVE EMOTIONS... ITS LIKE HOW SOMETIMES PEOPLE GET ENGROSSED IN THEIR WORK AND OTHER RESPONSIBILITIES SO AS TO AVOID FACING DEEP EMOTIONAL TROUBLES...SO WHILE YOU ARE CONNECTING WITH YOUR EMOTIONAL ASPECTS BUT SOMETIMES THE ABOVE TENDENCY CAN ALSO LEAD TO DISTANCES AND LACK OF CONNECT... ALWAYS REMEMBER TO PRIORITIZE AND BALANCE YOUR WORK WITH FAMILY DEAR NHU... And I don't remember if I went to visit her mother. The dream shows that I have opened up my receptivity but I am still blocked because there is still a lack of inner love, proper concern for those around me, which means I am not yet caring for myself properly. I have difficulty nourishing the ability to receive, the ability to care for others (eating by infusion into the body). I exhausted myself trying to make up for this lack of love, because I made up for it in the wrong way (excessively caring, and caring for the wrong person). WONDERFUL UNDERSTANDING DEAR INITIATE The end of the dream shows that I have not visited my adoptive mother, which also means that I need to continue to improve my ability to take care of myself, and those around me more. This may stem from the fact that I am not close enough, still cold with relatives, so I have not connected deeply with them YES WELL RECEIVED BUT ALSO REMEMBER TO BE BALANCED... CONNECTING WITH RELATIVES TOO MUCH OWING TO YOUR DEPENDENCEIS CAN ALSO PROVE TO BE COUNTER PRODUCTIVE... MAINTAIN A WONDERFUL DISCERNMENT WHILE DOING SO. And this is also the answer to my intention when working with the angel Chavakhiah. YES PRIMARILY RELATED TO NOTIONS OF RESISTANCE TO TAKE HELP, DISTANCE & LACK OF CONNECT, TENDENCY TO AVOID FACING SENSITIVE EMOTIONAL ISSUES IN THE ILLUSION OF KEEPING YOURSELF BUSY.. ALSO REFER TO THE COMMENTS ABOVE AND BECAUSE YOU WERE ASKING ABOUT YOUR SISTER, AND YOU SEE MS.HANH WORRYING ABOUT HER MOTHER, IT SHOWS THERE ARE PAST MEMORIES TO SOLVE WITHIN YOU FIRST (MOTHER = ORIGIN OF FEMININE POLARITY)... WHERE YOU COULD HAVE BEEN TOO KIND, GENTLE WITH YOUR SISTER FOR EXAMPLE... VERSUS BEING TOO SELF-CENTERED AND NOT WANTING TO CONNECT WITH HER BECAUSE OF YOUR RESONANCE... NEXT TIME YOU CAN DESCRIBE IN MORE DEPTH THE RELATIONSHIP WITH YOUR SISTER, TRYING TO SEE WHAT CAUSED YOU TO HAVE DIFFICULTIES TO CONNECT... SO AS TO START THE MOVEMENT OF RECONCILIATION WITHIN YOU FIRST... 🌟 GOOD OVERALL DECODING AND SUMMARY DEAR NHU... WELL DONE ... UNIVERSE HAS PROVIDED YOU A WONDERFUL GUIDANCE IN TERMS OF ASPECTS THAT YOU CAN WORK ON TOWARDS BULDING AN ANGELIC RELATIONSHIP WITH YOUR SISTER. HOWEVER DO IT WITH BALANCE AND DISCERNMENT WHILE DECODING YOUR RESONANCES... YOUR INNER DOCTOR HAS ADVISED YOU TO KEEP WORKING WITH ANGELIC INTENTIONS AND THEN REVIEW THE SITUATION AFTER SOMETIME... ONCE THIS INNER ACNE IS HEALED THEN SOME NEW POSSIBILITIES MIGHT OPEN UP... JUST KEEP FOCUSSING ON YOUR INNER WORK WITH PATIENCE, LOVE AND PERSISTENCE Now I feel relieved because it's like the doctor is speaking for me. Because I also think that the treatment is basically gone, but I don't understand why these spots keep popping up.Then I thanked the doctor and I went home. YES... BECAUSE IN A WAY YOUR SOUL KNOWS WHAT THE MEDICINE IS (SELF-WORK) BUT THE % OF UNCONSCIOUS NEGATIVE MEMORIES KEEP POPPING UP SOMETIMES AND HAVE NOT YET BEEN COMPLETELY CLEANSED... ALSO IN A SUBTLE WAY IT IS TELLING YOU TO FOCUS ON YOUR EFFORT AND THE PROCESS AND NOT THE RESULT... IT WILL HAPPEN ON ITS OWN... The dream shows that I am still too focused on results, wanting quick results. Meanwhile, I need to work with myself to transform resonant memories. The dream also shows that when I do my current job, I feel physically healed, however, it also indicates underlying issues that have not been deepened. I am still superficial with identifying and working with myself to understand knowledge and apply it to life. WELL DISCERNED DEAR NHU... ALSO REFER TO THE COMMENTS ABOVE IT IS A DREAM THAT TELLS YOU TO WORK ON YOUR SELF-ESTEEM AT WORK... NOT TO DEPEND TOO MUCH ON OTHERS ENCOURAGING OR SUPPORTING YOU... I have been to the doctor a few times and have not cleared most of the acne. However, there are still a few acne spots that keep popping up and not going away (like in a dream). But the last time I went to the doctor, the doctor definitely told me: if you take the medicine this time, the acne will definitely go away. And I just said thank you and went home. HERE THE PERCENTAGE OF DUALITY MAKES THE LIGHT FLICKER AND THIS ABSENCE OF CLARITY CREATED BY THE FLICKERING LIGHT CAN CREATE INSECURITIES, FEARS INSIDE AS REPRESENTED BY THE PANICS OF HOUSEMATES. AND THE GHOSTS ARE STILL THERE WAITING TO BE TRANSFORMED Then a friend came. I was a little scared and asked if she saw or felt anything. This friend said it was normal SO THIS PART OF YOU TRIES TO SEE THINGS AS NORMAL WHICH ISN'T ACCORDING TO THE SITUATION HERE. After that, 2 friends came (1 male and 1 female). The female is Giang [- a part of my feminine polarity and emotional world, she is also one of my close friends in real life, and she recently settled abroad: too stable, there are delays in thinking and acting, lacking the ability to materialize ] . She immediately saw the ghosts and said to me: there are many ghosts around you, even sitting next to you. Are you afraid or do they harm you?     "dream_text": "In the late afternoon, my housemate and I were doing homework in the room. When I turn on the desk lamp, the light is very dim. Then, I moved the clothes rack right at the window to increase the light BUT AS IT WAS AFTERNOON, STILL THE CLOTHES RACK WOULD HAVE BLOCKED THE NATURAL LIGHT COMING IN. I tried to turn on the other lights but they didn't work or were very dim. I'm starting to feel like there are ghosts in the room. My inner ghosts show I go deeper into layers of memory about my repressed instinctive needs, which have not yet been understood and transformed. And my current work environment has triggered this. The dim light showed that my interior was wavered by black and white, by righteousness and falsehood, between positive and negative, which I myself could not clearly distinguish. I keep trying to turn them on but the light is still flickering. My housemate is a bit scared and panicky at the moment. I silently prayed in my head: dear brothers and sisters, I need light to study for a bit, please give me some light. My inner housemate showed that even though I was still a bit scared inside, I was also able to calm down, not panic and try to communicate, talk to this part of me for comfort. title_pdf: 07 Life - 22-year friendship [2023]. last case id: C0235. PDF text: Dream date: Saturday, 1 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I chanted Angel Leuviah with the intention that: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend HERE YOU CAN REFINE THIS QUESTION BY SAYING "WHAT ARE MY RESONANCES WITH MY OLD BEST FRIEND ?" TO GET DEEPER IN THE MEMORIES RELATED TO FRIENDSHIP THAT CREATES BLOCKAGES IN DEVELOPING UNCONDITIONAL LOVE, DETACHMENT, BALANCE IN POLARITIES ETC. I have no dreams so I will share our stories and some decode that I can understand. Phuong is my childhood friend (the one I mentioned in dream "Childhood friend"). Our mother is colleague and we were born in the same year. We go to school together. From elementary school to high school, most of the time we were in the same class. We were companions in almost everything during our childhood, from hanging out with friends, doing things together, going to extra classes, even skipping school together. When we're together, mostly Phuong will be the one to protect and support me. Even though I'm the same age, I always call Phuong an older sister. And I don't know what comes from that Phuong always protects me, protects me. Partly since I was born I have been quite thin and small, while Phuong is much taller and also has had a high degree of independence since childhood. SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THAT THE NEED TO FEEL PROTECTED CREATES DEPENDENCIES AND COMPLEXES RELATED TO INFERIORITY AND SUPERIORITY BECAUSE OF LACK OF UNDERSTANDING THAT WE ARE ALWAYS PROTECTED, EVEN IN DIFFICULT TIMES. During this time, I realized that I had no particular personality. As for me, whatever it is, I have no opinions or desires. AND THIS IS COMING FROM PAST LIVES AS A MONK WHERE YOU WERE FOCUSED ON "EMPTY YOUR MIND" Maybe when at home, my family chooses for me, and when outside, Phuong is the one to do it. Gradually, I asked myself the question: what is my personality, what do I want, what do I love. WONDERFUL SELF-QUESTIONING It's like everything I learn follows Phuong. This period may have gradually revealed the manifestations of my apathy (a major cause of my depression in recent years). YES, ALSO THIS OVER-DEPENDENCY ON OTHERS SOMEHOW CREATES A LACK OF IDENTITY, AND SELF-RECOGNITION INSIDE. Even if Phuong loves a music group, she shared it with me. I don't know if I like them or not, but then gradually when I follow this group, I engraved in my heart that I also love them and I don't really know what it is. AS IT CREATES A LACK OF DISCERNMENT. There was once when we chose a high school to attend (a big school in province or a school in Saigon - a better educational environment, so we can pass the exam to a good University). And Phuong chose to move to Saigon, while I have no idea, I just want to go away from home. And Phuong told me that if we go to different schools, our relationship will not be as close as before. And that's one of the reasons why I chose the same high school as Phuong. Even though it's a very expensive school and far from home (a boarding school in Saigon). SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES THAT CREATE A LACK OF DISCERNMENT AND AFFECT YOUR CAPACITY TO DECIDE AND TAKE THE RIGHT DECISIONS. And during 3 years in high school, I gradually realized that I was almost like Phuong's shadow YES, BECAUSE OF A LACK OF SELF- ACKNOWLEDGMENT, AND SELF-IDENTITY. With everyone, we are always together, so no matter what, it will be enough just to tell Phuong, and Phuong will decide everything. And no matter what happens, Phuong will always be the one to notice me, ask about me, and take care of me first BUT THIS CREATES AN IMBALANCE DEAR NHU AS IT CREATES DEPENDENCIES. TRUE UNCONDITIONAL LOVE HELPS DEVELOP DETACHMENT, AUTONOMY AND ABOVE ALL SELF-RESPECT. HERE AS EVERYTHING IS DECIDED BY PHUONG, THIS CREATES DISCREPANCIES DEEP INSIDE YOU . And because of these consolations, I am happy and secure in Phuong's protection, I rely on Phuong, but I have overlooked some things that are important to me YES, ONE OF THE IMPORTANT THINGS THAT YOU HAVE OVERLOOKED IS YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL TO DECIDE WHAT IS RIGHT FOR YOU... The universe arranged for Phuong and me to go to different senior classes, and later to different universities. I gradually had to make my own decisions, communicate with people and express myself more. I find that the way I show myself has many actions and gestures like Phuong, although inside I feel quite confident, I realize that I am only confident in a very small circle. But out of that circle, I was scared, self-deprecating and timid. YES AND THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON EVERYTHING ON PHUONG... When I was at university, I was completely separated from Phuong in terms of residence, school, and circle of friends, I really had a clear space to continue to learn the lessons that the Universe arranged and reexamine the relationship with Phuong. During the 4 years, we had times when we didn't see each other. At this time, I am like a bird released from a cage, I plunge into social events, participate in many activities, jobs about starting a business, getting rich, and activities at school. While Phuong is the opposite, most Phuong rarely participates in activities, but Phuong focuses on resting, making friends, and having fun with friends. SO YOU CAN SEE HOW FOLLOWING YOUR LIFE PROGRAM CAN FREE YOU FROM THE DEPENDENCIES AND HELP YOU REALIZE YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL... And up to a time, Phuong told me: Phuong heard from our friends that I have changed a lot since university. They see me as a person with unlimited positive energy toward career and personal development. This is also the period when I started to have debts for investment and business to establish a business. I also did not think that I was reckless enough to dare to owe a huge amount of money when I was a student, when I could not earn much money. And especially before that, I had no concept that I needed a lot of money, before that, I was just an ordinary person and lived a normal life, with no special interests. BECAUSE THE DEPENDENCIES IN THE PAST CREATED THE OTHER EXTREME IN ORDER TO COMPENSATE FOR THE FREEDOM AND HERE THIS FREEDOM IS MORE INCLINED TOWARDS MATERIAL POSSESSIONS AND NOT THE TRUE INNER FREEDOM... IN THE PAST, YOU WERE MORE LIKE AN ANCIENT MONK WHO WAS TOO DETACHED FROM MATTER BUT THE MATERIALISTIC MEMORIES FROM EVEN DEEPER ANCIENT PAST LIVES WERE NOT ACTIVATED... When entering the Internship to prepare for graduation, I have a lot of worries about investments, my own business, debts and family, and Phuong has environmental work problems with colleagues, bosses. And Phuong came to me to share. At this time, for me, these problems I have experienced a lot and understand in depth when I have been in contact with many businesses and people outside of society. And I share Phuong my advices, but maybe because she doesn't have as much experience as me, we can't understand each other, and I feel like I can't listen to other people's problems anymore. BECAUSE EARLIER THERE WAS NO LIMIT OR BOUNDARIES IN YOUR DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG , SO NOW THE SOUL WANTS TO HAVE THOSE BOUNDARIES, AND LIMITS IN ORDER TO PROTECT ITS INTIMACY, BUT THIS CREATES A DISTANCE AS THERE IS LESS UNDERSTANDING NOW. IN A WAY, IF YOU OBSERVE THE PATTERN AND THINK DEEPLY, YOU WILL FIND THAT THERE WAS A LACK OF UNDERSTANDING EARLIER ALSO BECAUSE MOST OF THE TIME PHUONG WAS DECIDING FOR YOU AND YOU WERE FOLLOWING BECAUSE OF A LACK OF INNER ASSERTION... And a few months before we graduated, I decided to end our 22-year friendship, because I don't know any better way to stop receiving problems from Phuong. Looking back now, I know I was too harsh on myself, in this relationship. Because maybe I have a very high ego inside OK..BUT THERE IS ANOTHER PERSPECTIVE ALSO THAT YOU SHOULD CONSIDER AND THAT IS RELATED TO THE DYNAMICS OF LACK AND COMPENSATION OF 23/07/2025, 12:13 22-year friendship | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/108424 2/3 DEPENDENCIES AND FREEDOM OF CHOICE, the Universe has arranged that during my childhood I did not have the opportunity to express myself, and when I was able to express myself, I overreacted. I also learned about 2 polarity relationships. Because during University time, Phuong once admitted to me that she was a lesbian. At that time, I don't really know how it will affect our relationship, so I just listen and let it be. SO YOU SEE THE WAY YOU USE THE WORD "SOULMATE" IN THE PERSONAL RESEARCH IS ACTUALLY SHOWING YOU THE MEMORIES OF DISCREPANCIES AND IMBALANCE IN THE POLARITIES AS NORMALLY THIS WORD SHOULD BE USED IN A COUPLE RELATIONSHIP... From my inner Phuong, I can realize that I have comparisons, low self-esteem, a tendency to be jealous when I am not valued, even bad thoughts about the person who protected me. But I know this is a lesson that the Universe has arranged for me to understand myself and realize what I need to transform. ALSO, THESE MEMORIES ARE A RESULT OF YOUR OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG ALSO... Angelic thank you DEAR NHU, A CONCRETE SITUATION, ANY REALITY EXPERIENCED OR YOUR EXPERIENCES (REAL LIFE STORIES) CAN BE DECODED LIKE A DREAM BY MARKING IMPORTANT SIGNS AND SYMBOLS AND INTERPRETING THEM WITH PLUS, MINUS. REMEMBER A FEW OF THE IMPORTANT DIVINE LAWS THAT SAY - DREAMS ARE REALITY AND REALITY ARE DREAMS, EVERYTHING IS A SYMBOL... PDF text: Dream date: Saturday, 1 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I chanted Angel Leuviah with the intention that: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend HERE YOU CAN REFINE THIS QUESTION BY SAYING "WHAT ARE MY RESONANCES WITH MY OLD BEST FRIEND ?" TO GET DEEPER IN THE MEMORIES RELATED TO FRIENDSHIP THAT CREATES BLOCKAGES IN DEVELOPING UNCONDITIONAL LOVE, DETACHMENT, BALANCE IN POLARITIES ETC. I have no dreams so I will share our stories and some decode that I can understand. Phuong is my childhood friend (the one I mentioned in dream "Childhood friend"). Our mother is colleague and we were born in the same year. We go to school together. From elementary school to high school, most of the time we were in the same class. We were companions in almost everything during our childhood, from hanging out with friends, doing things together, going to extra classes, even skipping school together. When we're together, mostly Phuong will be the one to protect and support me. Even though I'm the same age, I always call Phuong an older sister. And I don't know what comes from that Phuong always protects me, protects me. Partly since I was born I have been quite thin and small, while Phuong is much taller and also has had a high degree of independence since childhood. SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THAT THE NEED TO FEEL PROTECTED CREATES DEPENDENCIES AND COMPLEXES RELATED TO INFERIORITY AND SUPERIORITY BECAUSE OF LACK OF UNDERSTANDING THAT WE ARE ALWAYS PROTECTED, EVEN IN DIFFICULT TIMES. During this time, I realized that I had no particular personality. As for me, whatever it is, I have no opinions or desires. AND THIS IS COMING FROM PAST LIVES AS A MONK WHERE YOU WERE FOCUSED ON "EMPTY YOUR MIND" Maybe when at home, my family chooses for me, and when outside, Phuong is the one to do it. Gradually, I asked myself the question: what is my personality, what do I want, what do I love. WONDERFUL SELF-QUESTIONING It's like everything I learn follows Phuong. This period may have gradually revealed the manifestations of my apathy (a major cause of my depression in recent years). YES, ALSO THIS OVER-DEPENDENCY ON OTHERS SOMEHOW CREATES A LACK OF IDENTITY, AND SELF-RECOGNITION INSIDE. Even if Phuong loves a music group, she shared it with me. I don't know if I like them or not, but then gradually when I follow this group, I engraved in my heart that I also love them and I don't really know what it is. AS IT CREATES A LACK OF DISCERNMENT. There was once when we chose a high school to attend (a big school in province or a school in Saigon - a better educational environment, so we can pass the exam to a good University). And Phuong chose to move to Saigon, while I have no idea, I just want to go away from home. And Phuong told me that if we go to different schools, our relationship will not be as close as before. And that's one of the reasons why I chose the same high school as Phuong. Even though it's a very expensive school and far from home (a boarding school in Saigon). SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES THAT CREATE A LACK OF DISCERNMENT AND AFFECT YOUR CAPACITY TO DECIDE AND TAKE THE RIGHT DECISIONS. And during 3 years in high school, I gradually realized that I was almost like Phuong's shadow YES, BECAUSE OF A LACK OF SELF- ACKNOWLEDGMENT, AND SELF-IDENTITY. With everyone, we are always together, so no matter what, it will be enough just to tell Phuong, and Phuong will decide everything. And no matter what happens, Phuong will always be the one to notice me, ask about me, and take care of me first BUT THIS CREATES AN IMBALANCE DEAR NHU AS IT CREATES DEPENDENCIES. TRUE UNCONDITIONAL LOVE HELPS DEVELOP DETACHMENT, AUTONOMY AND ABOVE ALL SELF-RESPECT. HERE AS EVERYTHING IS DECIDED BY PHUONG, THIS CREATES DISCREPANCIES DEEP INSIDE YOU . And because of these consolations, I am happy and secure in Phuong's protection, I rely on Phuong, but I have overlooked some things that are important to me YES, ONE OF THE IMPORTANT THINGS THAT YOU HAVE OVERLOOKED IS YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL TO DECIDE WHAT IS RIGHT FOR YOU... The universe arranged for Phuong and me to go to different senior classes, and later to different universities. I gradually had to make my own decisions, communicate with people and express myself more. I find that the way I show myself has many actions and gestures like Phuong, although inside I feel quite confident, I realize that I am only confident in a very small circle. But out of that circle, I was scared, self-deprecating and timid. YES AND THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON EVERYTHING ON PHUONG... When I was at university, I was completely separated from Phuong in terms of residence, school, and circle of friends, I really had a clear space to continue to learn the lessons that the Universe arranged and reexamine the relationship with Phuong. During the 4 years, we had times when we didn't see each other. At this time, I am like a bird released from a cage, I plunge into social events, participate in many activities, jobs about starting a business, getting rich, and activities at school. While Phuong is the opposite, most Phuong rarely participates in activities, but Phuong focuses on resting, making friends, and having fun with friends. SO YOU CAN SEE HOW FOLLOWING YOUR LIFE PROGRAM CAN FREE YOU FROM THE DEPENDENCIES AND HELP YOU REALIZE YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL... And up to a time, Phuong told me: Phuong heard from our friends that I have changed a lot since university. They see me as a person with unlimited positive energy toward career and personal development. This is also the period when I started to have debts for investment and business to establish a business. I also did not think that I was reckless enough to dare to owe a huge amount of money when I was a student, when I could not earn much money. And especially before that, I had no concept that I needed a lot of money, before that, I was just an ordinary person and lived a normal life, with no special interests. BECAUSE THE DEPENDENCIES IN THE PAST CREATED THE OTHER EXTREME IN ORDER TO COMPENSATE FOR THE FREEDOM AND HERE THIS FREEDOM IS MORE INCLINED TOWARDS MATERIAL POSSESSIONS AND NOT THE TRUE INNER FREEDOM... IN THE PAST, YOU WERE MORE LIKE AN ANCIENT MONK WHO WAS TOO DETACHED FROM MATTER BUT THE MATERIALISTIC MEMORIES FROM EVEN DEEPER ANCIENT PAST LIVES WERE NOT ACTIVATED... When entering the Internship to prepare for graduation, I have a lot of worries about investments, my own business, debts and family, and Phuong has environmental work problems with colleagues, bosses. And Phuong came to me to share. At this time, for me, these problems I have experienced a lot and understand in depth when I have been in contact with many businesses and people outside of society. And I share Phuong my advices, but maybe because she doesn't have as much experience as me, we can't understand each other, and I feel like I can't listen to other people's problems anymore. BECAUSE EARLIER THERE WAS NO LIMIT OR BOUNDARIES IN YOUR DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG , SO NOW THE SOUL WANTS TO HAVE THOSE BOUNDARIES, AND LIMITS IN ORDER TO PROTECT ITS INTIMACY, BUT THIS CREATES A DISTANCE AS THERE IS LESS UNDERSTANDING NOW. IN A WAY, IF YOU OBSERVE THE PATTERN AND THINK DEEPLY, YOU WILL FIND THAT THERE WAS A LACK OF UNDERSTANDING EARLIER ALSO BECAUSE MOST OF THE TIME PHUONG WAS DECIDING FOR YOU AND YOU WERE FOLLOWING BECAUSE OF A LACK OF INNER ASSERTION... And a few months before we graduated, I decided to end our 22-year friendship, because I don't know any better way to stop receiving problems from Phuong. Looking back now, I know I was too harsh on myself, in this relationship. Because maybe I have a very high ego inside OK..BUT THERE IS ANOTHER PERSPECTIVE ALSO THAT YOU SHOULD CONSIDER AND THAT IS RELATED TO THE DYNAMICS OF LACK AND COMPENSATION OF 23/07/2025, 12:13 22-year friendship | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/108424 2/3 DEPENDENCIES AND FREEDOM OF CHOICE, the Universe has arranged that during my childhood I did not have the opportunity to express myself, and when I was able to express myself, I overreacted. I also learned about 2 polarity relationships. Because during University time, Phuong once admitted to me that she was a lesbian. At that time, I don't really know how it will affect our relationship, so I just listen and let it be. SO YOU SEE THE WAY YOU USE THE WORD "SOULMATE" IN THE PERSONAL RESEARCH IS ACTUALLY SHOWING YOU THE MEMORIES OF DISCREPANCIES AND IMBALANCE IN THE POLARITIES AS NORMALLY THIS WORD SHOULD BE USED IN A COUPLE RELATIONSHIP... From my inner Phuong, I can realize that I have comparisons, low self-esteem, a tendency to be jealous when I am not valued, even bad thoughts about the person who protected me. But I know this is a lesson that the Universe has arranged for me to understand myself and realize what I need to transform. ALSO, THESE MEMORIES ARE A RESULT OF YOUR OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG ALSO... Angelic thank you DEAR NHU, A CONCRETE SITUATION, ANY REALITY EXPERIENCED OR YOUR EXPERIENCES (REAL LIFE STORIES) CAN BE DECODED LIKE A DREAM BY MARKING IMPORTANT SIGNS AND SYMBOLS AND INTERPRETING THEM WITH PLUS, MINUS. REMEMBER A FEW OF THE IMPORTANT DIVINE LAWS THAT SAY - DREAMS ARE REALITY AND REALITY ARE DREAMS, EVERYTHING IS A SYMBOL... ANGELIC CONTINUITY WITH JELIEL & HAHAIAH ÂN

title_pdf: 08 Dream - Kasara and baby [2023]. last case id: C0236. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 7 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream mood: Surprise Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I continue my intention: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend. During the day SO THE DAY HERE SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTS THE ACTION WORLD THAT HAS MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES. IT'S LIKE SOMETIMES THE DECISIONS THAT YOU MAY TAKE RELATED TO WORK/ACTION WORLD IS IMPACTED BECAUSE OF THE DISTORTED MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS, TO PLEASE OTHERS... , on the bed SO THIS CAN HAVE AN AFFECT ON YOUR PERSONAL INTIMACY AND RECEPTIVITY, I lie in the innermost , Kasara [- a part of my feminine polarity and my emotional world: too rigid, too frank, outspoken (so straightforward that sometimes may not pay attention to the listener's feelings), lack of empathy, tolerant, overly emotionally independent, high ego, disinterested in others, tendency to judge others VERY WELL DEEPENED... AND THIS INNER KASARA CREATES LACK OF RECEPTIVITY INSIDE ] is in the middle, and the outermost is a newborn baby [- represents my future, the ability to actualize, express, motivation for the future project (boy): has a joking attitude, lacks the right seriousness, lacks concentration, protects myself OF COURSE ON ONE HAND A NEWBORN BABY SYMBOLICALLY SHOWS OF WHAT'S IN THE PREPARATION IN FUTURE, BUT ON THE OTHER HAND IT ALSO SIGNIFIES WHAT HAS BEEN MATERIALIZED NOW. HERE THE NEWBORN BABY ALSO INDICATES A LACK OF RESPONSIBILITY IN THE WAY YOU MATERIALIZE, WITHOUT PROPER CARE, OR THE ABILITY TO DECIDE. YOU ARE SHOWN EMOTIONAL AND OTHER FORMS OF ATTACHMENTS AND DEPENDENCIES. AND AT THE SAME TIME, IT IS TOO INTIMATE TO BE ON THE SAME BED WITH YOUR INNER KASARA, THE INNER NEWBORN BABY AND YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THE DEEP NEED OF SPIRITUAL LOVE THAT YOU ARE SEEKING... ] , Ha [- she is my elder sister in reality, she is 7 months pregnant with a baby boy. She represents a part of my femininity and the emotional world: too soft, too open, too receptive, fragile, lacks ability to defend herself, lacks opinions, choices for herself, easily listen to the arrangement of others SO SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTING YOUR FEMININE POLARITY AND IN A WAY YOUR BEHAVIOUR IN EARLIER YEARS WHEN YOU WERE WITH PHUONG AND DEPENDENT ON HER SO YOU CAN SEE HOW PROFOUND THE UNIVERSE ARRANGES DREAMS AND CERTAIN LIFE SITUATION TO LEARN FROM IT AND EVOLVE... ] 's child. The opening dream shows that I am being overly protective of myself, too secure, lacking in outward expression (my position is in the innermost). At the same time, on the outside action side, I sometimes appear too soft, fragile, to be protected, attracted attention, too open, joking. My inner Kasara in the middle is like a protective wall that I built to protect myself. HERE THE MAIN MEANING IS ABOUT WANTING TO FUSE TOO MUCH WITH OTHERS... AND THE BED IS ALSO A SYMBOL OF LAZINESS AS IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE VERY COMFORTABLE REGARDING YOUR SPIRITUAL PATH... YOU WOULD LIKE TO FEEL THE WARMTH OF LOVE... BUT IN A COMPENSATORY WAY... AND THIS WILL LEAD YOU TO CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES AS YOU OBSERVE IN THE FOLLOWING SCENE... Ha told me and Kasara to look after the baby carefully, so as not to let him fall off the bed [- lack of ability to protect oneself on social level, in intimate aspect, difficulty in expressing, actualizing, lack of concentration, sometimes having a slightly careless attitude, joking WE CAN CONNECT THIS WITH THE PART WHERE YOU SHARED IN YOUR PREVIOUS SUBMISSION HOW YOU SEE PHUONG AS SYMBOL TO PROTECT YOU THEREBY WE SEE HERE TOO MUCH DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS THAT CAUSE DIFFICULTIES IN YOUR ACTION WORLD ALSO. ] . It seems the baby is a bit naughty. I feel a dangerous position, but I trust Kasara, so I still focus on talking to Kasara [- too much self- centeredness, lack of proper attention to my ability to express ] SO YOU CAN SEE AGAIN YOU TRUST ON SOMEONE ELSE WHEN A RESPONSIBILITY IS GIVEN TO YOU. HERE SYMBOLICALLY YOUR INNER HA GAVE A CHANCE TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR INNER BABY (REPRESENTING ACTIONS) BUT THE MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ARE STRONG TO BLOCK THE ABILITY TO DECIDE TO TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF. IN OTHER WORDS, YOU SHOULD BE CAREFUL AND DEVELOP YOUR DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN FRONT OF SPIRITUAL PEOPLE... KASARA IS ALSO A COLLECTIVE SYMBOL THUS, SHE ALSO REPRESENTS A PART OF YOU THAT HAS THE POWER TO DIFFUSE KNOWLEDGE ON A COLLECTIVE SCALE... SO YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN LACK DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN CONTACT WITH A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... IT SHOWS THAT WHEN YOU BECOME SPIRITUAL, YOU CAN DEVELOP A SPIRITUAL EGO, HAVING CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES LISTENING TO OTHERS THAT HAVE AN INFERIORITY COMPLEX AND LACK OF SELF-CONFIDENCE... IT IS VERY PROFOUND TO UNDERSTAND THAT... YOU ARE SHOWN HOW YOU COULD REACT IF ONE DAY YOU BECOME A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... SO YOU SEE, YOU CAN GO FROM ONE EXTREME TO ANOTHER...FROM BEING FRAGILE TO BEING TOO CONFIDENT... I was too focused on protecting myself, because it was so safe that no one could interfere, and because it was so easy. And because of the lack of self-interest on the outside (expression, even appearance), my inner baby has a tendency to be disruptive, mischievous to get attention, and as natural of a baby when not cared for or guided. YES, BUT THIS WAY OF SEEING IS MORE ON THE OUTSIDE. HERE IN THIS PART, THERE WAS A CHANCE FOR YOU TO TRANSFORM THE DEPENDENCIES BUT INSTEAD, YOU CHOSE TO BE DEPENDENT... YOU CAN COMPLETE THE UNDERSTANDING WITH THE COMMENTS ABOVE... When Ha passed by, she saw that the baby was slightly rocking and seemed to be about to fall off the bed. Ha reminded myself and Kasara. At this time, Kasara hugged the baby in her arms [- This action shows that I have the ability to protect, comfort and care for my inner baby, but it is only done when prompted. And this action sometimes I just do it, not because I really care about my inner baby (shown in the saying of my inner Kasara). This shows that inside I still have a disinterest, indifference to myself and to the world around me. This probably comes because I'm too much overprotected by my inner Phuong (the old best friend I'm asking about). I rely on Phuong too much, so it can be assumed that Phuong will always protect me, so this part has created my lack of ability to protect, care and express on the outside AND BECAUSE DEEP INSIDE, YOU HAVE ALSO MEMORIES OF OVER-CONFIDENCE AND SPIRITUAL EGO... SOMETIMES YOU CAN DIMINISH YOURSELF IN ORDER TO RECEIVE ATTENTION AND COMPLIMENT... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE OF COURSE... ] and said that if my child died, I would not regret it HERE THIS IS ON THE EXTREME SIDE OF BEING DETACHED. THIS PART OF DREAM SHOWS YOU TO DEVELOP THE EQUILIBRIUM BETWEEN ATTACHMENT AND DETACHMENT, FIRST AND FOREMOST BY UNDERSTANDING THEIR REAL MEANING AND THEN BY BEING RESPONSIBLE AND DETACHED AT THE SAME TIME BUT IT TAKES TIME DEAR NHU, FIRST IT REQUIRES WORKING ON MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES AND UNDERSTANDING THE MEANING OF TRUE SPIRITUAL AUTONOMY, SO THIS DREAM IS A PRECISE ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION WITH HELP OF WHICH YOU CAN EMBARK OF THE BEAUTIFUL JOURNEY OF DEVELOPING A TRUE SPIRITUAL AUTONOMY... Then she put the baby inside, between herself and me. I was amazed and thinking: oh, how can Kasara be so independent, so determined and so unattached like this? [- I think too positive. The action of my inner Kasara can be interpreted in a positive sense, but here is the negative case, and that should not be with a newborn baby so should be viewed in a negative light. WELL UNDERSTOOD, IT'S MORE LIKE BEING ATTRACTED TOWARDS THE CAPACITIES OF OTHERS (LIKE BECOMING A FAN) AND THIS WAY OF SEEING OTHERS BLOCKS THE DISCERNMENT ] AND WHEN YOU HAVE THIS LINE OF CODE, IT IS IMPORTANT NOT TO BE IMPRESSED BY "FALSE" SPIRITUAL PROFESSORS THAT YOU CAN EASILY ENCOUNTER NOWADAYS... YOU CAN WRONGLY PERCEIVE THE QUALITIES OF SOMEONE WHILE THE SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR IS NOT REALLY RIGHT... THAT IS WHY AT UCM, IT TAKES A MINIMUM OF 5 YEARS TO BECOME A THERAPIST... AND THEN WITH THE EXPERTISE DEGREE, THERAPISTS CAN BECOME PROFESSORS IF THEY WISH... THE TRAP FOR A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR IS TO LET THE SPIRITUAL EGO DEVELOP... AND THE MORE YOU WILL EVOLVE AND FREE YOURSELF FROM EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES, THE MORE YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SEE THOSE PATTERNS IN YOU AND OTHERS... YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN BE TOO DETACHED AND IT IS NOT GOOD EITHER... AS SAID ABOVE, IT IS IMPORTANT TO DEVELOP BOTH THE QUALITIES OF RESPONSIBILITY AND DETACHMENT... A moment later, Kasara was talking to me about Ha's problems. She stood next to the bed, pointed directly at Ha [- self-judge (my inner Ha), because my inner Ha is so fragile, even at times I think it can be too weak ] who was lying on the bed and holding the baby in her arms, and said: emotional dependence. AND YOU SEE HOW YOUR INNER KASARA CAN BECOME VERY INTENSE AND LACK DIPLOMACY... AND THIS IS THE CONSEQUENCE OF SPIRITUAL EGO, BECAUSE YOUR INNER KASARA COULD HAVE SHARED PRIVATELY TO YOUR INNER HA... BUT DOING THAT IN FRONT OF OTHERS CAN BE TOO INTENSE FOR YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THAT THE SPIRITUAL EGO FROM YOUR INNER KASARA CAN SOMETIMES DIMINISH OTHERS... YOU SEE THAT IF YOU ARE IN A POSITION OF TEACHING OTHERS, YOU CAN LACK LOVE AND BE TOO DIRECT, YOU CAN LACK DIPLOMACY... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE... AND REMEMBER ALSO, THIS DREAM IS HAPPENING IN ONE OF THE MOST INTIMATE PLACE, IT MEANS THAT THOSE MEMORIES ARE STILL WITHIN YOU AND PROBABLY NOT MANIFESTED ON THE CONCRETE LEVEL... PDF text: Dream date: Saturday, 1 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I chanted Angel Leuviah with the intention that: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend HERE YOU CAN REFINE THIS QUESTION BY SAYING "WHAT ARE MY RESONANCES WITH MY OLD BEST FRIEND ?" TO GET DEEPER IN THE MEMORIES RELATED TO FRIENDSHIP THAT CREATES BLOCKAGES IN DEVELOPING UNCONDITIONAL LOVE, DETACHMENT, BALANCE IN POLARITIES ETC. I have no dreams so I will share our stories and some decode that I can understand. Phuong is my childhood friend (the one I mentioned in dream "Childhood friend"). Our mother is colleague and we were born in the same year. We go to school together. From elementary school to high school, most of the time we were in the same class. We were companions in almost everything during our childhood, from hanging out with friends, doing things together, going to extra classes, even skipping school together. When we're together, mostly Phuong will be the one to protect and support me. Even though I'm the same age, I always call Phuong an older sister. And I don't know what comes from that Phuong always protects me, protects me. Partly since I was born I have been quite thin and small, while Phuong is much taller and also has had a high degree of independence since childhood. SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THAT THE NEED TO FEEL PROTECTED CREATES DEPENDENCIES AND COMPLEXES RELATED TO INFERIORITY AND SUPERIORITY BECAUSE OF LACK OF UNDERSTANDING THAT WE ARE ALWAYS PROTECTED, EVEN IN DIFFICULT TIMES. During this time, I realized that I had no particular personality. As for me, whatever it is, I have no opinions or desires. AND THIS IS COMING FROM PAST LIVES AS A MONK WHERE YOU WERE FOCUSED ON "EMPTY YOUR MIND" Maybe when at home, my family chooses for me, and when outside, Phuong is the one to do it. Gradually, I asked myself the question: what is my personality, what do I want, what do I love. WONDERFUL SELF-QUESTIONING It's like everything I learn follows Phuong. This period may have gradually revealed the manifestations of my apathy (a major cause of my depression in recent years). YES, ALSO THIS OVER-DEPENDENCY ON OTHERS SOMEHOW CREATES A LACK OF IDENTITY, AND SELF-RECOGNITION INSIDE. Even if Phuong loves a music group, she shared it with me. I don't know if I like them or not, but then gradually when I follow this group, I engraved in my heart that I also love them and I don't really know what it is. AS IT CREATES A LACK OF DISCERNMENT. There was once when we chose a high school to attend (a big school in province or a school in Saigon - a better educational environment, so we can pass the exam to a good University). And Phuong chose to move to Saigon, while I have no idea, I just want to go away from home. And Phuong told me that if we go to different schools, our relationship will not be as close as before. And that's one of the reasons why I chose the same high school as Phuong. Even though it's a very expensive school and far from home (a boarding school in Saigon). SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES THAT CREATE A LACK OF DISCERNMENT AND AFFECT YOUR CAPACITY TO DECIDE AND TAKE THE RIGHT DECISIONS. And during 3 years in high school, I gradually realized that I was almost like Phuong's shadow YES, BECAUSE OF A LACK OF SELF- ACKNOWLEDGMENT, AND SELF-IDENTITY. With everyone, we are always together, so no matter what, it will be enough just to tell Phuong, and Phuong will decide everything. And no matter what happens, Phuong will always be the one to notice me, ask about me, and take care of me first BUT THIS CREATES AN IMBALANCE DEAR NHU AS IT CREATES DEPENDENCIES. TRUE UNCONDITIONAL LOVE HELPS DEVELOP DETACHMENT, AUTONOMY AND ABOVE ALL SELF-RESPECT. HERE AS EVERYTHING IS DECIDED BY PHUONG, THIS CREATES DISCREPANCIES DEEP INSIDE YOU . And because of these consolations, I am happy and secure in Phuong's protection, I rely on Phuong, but I have overlooked some things that are important to me YES, ONE OF THE IMPORTANT THINGS THAT YOU HAVE OVERLOOKED IS YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL TO DECIDE WHAT IS RIGHT FOR YOU... The universe arranged for Phuong and me to go to different senior classes, and later to different universities. I gradually had to make my own decisions, communicate with people and express myself more. I find that the way I show myself has many actions and gestures like Phuong, although inside I feel quite confident, I realize that I am only confident in a very small circle. But out of that circle, I was scared, self-deprecating and timid. YES AND THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON EVERYTHING ON PHUONG... When I was at university, I was completely separated from Phuong in terms of residence, school, and circle of friends, I really had a clear space to continue to learn the lessons that the Universe arranged and reexamine the relationship with Phuong. During the 4 years, we had times when we didn't see each other. At this time, I am like a bird released from a cage, I plunge into social events, participate in many activities, jobs about starting a business, getting rich, and activities at school. While Phuong is the opposite, most Phuong rarely participates in activities, but Phuong focuses on resting, making friends, and having fun with friends. SO YOU CAN SEE HOW FOLLOWING YOUR LIFE PROGRAM CAN FREE YOU FROM THE DEPENDENCIES AND HELP YOU REALIZE YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL... And up to a time, Phuong told me: Phuong heard from our friends that I have changed a lot since university. They see me as a person with unlimited positive energy toward career and personal development. This is also the period when I started to have debts for investment and business to establish a business. I also did not think that I was reckless enough to dare to owe a huge amount of money when I was a student, when I could not earn much money. And especially before that, I had no concept that I needed a lot of money, before that, I was just an ordinary person and lived a normal life, with no special interests. BECAUSE THE DEPENDENCIES IN THE PAST CREATED THE OTHER EXTREME IN ORDER TO COMPENSATE FOR THE FREEDOM AND HERE THIS FREEDOM IS MORE INCLINED TOWARDS MATERIAL POSSESSIONS AND NOT THE TRUE INNER FREEDOM... IN THE PAST, YOU WERE MORE LIKE AN ANCIENT MONK WHO WAS TOO DETACHED FROM MATTER BUT THE MATERIALISTIC MEMORIES FROM EVEN DEEPER ANCIENT PAST LIVES WERE NOT ACTIVATED... When entering the Internship to prepare for graduation, I have a lot of worries about investments, my own business, debts and family, and Phuong has environmental work problems with colleagues, bosses. And Phuong came to me to share. At this time, for me, these problems I have experienced a lot and understand in depth when I have been in contact with many businesses and people outside of society. And I share Phuong my advices, but maybe because she doesn't have as much experience as me, we can't understand each other, and I feel like I can't listen to other people's problems anymore. BECAUSE EARLIER THERE WAS NO LIMIT OR BOUNDARIES IN YOUR DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG , SO NOW THE SOUL WANTS TO HAVE THOSE BOUNDARIES, AND LIMITS IN ORDER TO PROTECT ITS INTIMACY, BUT THIS CREATES A DISTANCE AS THERE IS LESS UNDERSTANDING NOW. IN A WAY, IF YOU OBSERVE THE PATTERN AND THINK DEEPLY, YOU WILL FIND THAT THERE WAS A LACK OF UNDERSTANDING EARLIER ALSO BECAUSE MOST OF THE TIME PHUONG WAS DECIDING FOR YOU AND YOU WERE FOLLOWING BECAUSE OF A LACK OF INNER ASSERTION... And a few months before we graduated, I decided to end our 22-year friendship, because I don't know any better way to stop receiving problems from Phuong. Looking back now, I know I was too harsh on myself, in this relationship. Because maybe I have a very high ego inside OK..BUT THERE IS ANOTHER PERSPECTIVE ALSO THAT YOU SHOULD CONSIDER AND THAT IS RELATED TO THE DYNAMICS OF LACK AND COMPENSATION OF 23/07/2025, 12:13 22-year friendship | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/108424 2/3 DEPENDENCIES AND FREEDOM OF CHOICE, the Universe has arranged that during my childhood I did not have the opportunity to express myself, and when I was able to express myself, I overreacted. I also learned about 2 polarity relationships. Because during University time, Phuong once admitted to me that she was a lesbian. At that time, I don't really know how it will affect our relationship, so I just listen and let it be. SO YOU SEE THE WAY YOU USE THE WORD "SOULMATE" IN THE PERSONAL RESEARCH IS ACTUALLY SHOWING YOU THE MEMORIES OF DISCREPANCIES AND IMBALANCE IN THE POLARITIES AS NORMALLY THIS WORD SHOULD BE USED IN A COUPLE RELATIONSHIP... From my inner Phuong, I can realize that I have comparisons, low self-esteem, a tendency to be jealous when I am not valued, even bad thoughts about the person who protected me. But I know this is a lesson that the Universe has arranged for me to understand myself and realize what I need to transform. title_pdf: 08 Dream - Kasara and baby [2023]. last case id: C0236. PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 7 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream mood: Surprise Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I continue my intention: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend. During the day SO THE DAY HERE SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTS THE ACTION WORLD THAT HAS MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES. IT'S LIKE SOMETIMES THE DECISIONS THAT YOU MAY TAKE RELATED TO WORK/ACTION WORLD IS IMPACTED BECAUSE OF THE DISTORTED MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS, TO PLEASE OTHERS... , on the bed SO THIS CAN HAVE AN AFFECT ON YOUR PERSONAL INTIMACY AND RECEPTIVITY, I lie in the innermost , Kasara [- a part of my feminine polarity and my emotional world: too rigid, too frank, outspoken (so straightforward that sometimes may not pay attention to the listener's feelings), lack of empathy, tolerant, overly emotionally independent, high ego, disinterested in others, tendency to judge others VERY WELL DEEPENED... AND THIS INNER KASARA CREATES LACK OF RECEPTIVITY INSIDE ] is in the middle, and the outermost is a newborn baby [- represents my future, the ability to actualize, express, motivation for the future project (boy): has a joking attitude, lacks the right seriousness, lacks concentration, protects myself OF COURSE ON ONE HAND A NEWBORN BABY SYMBOLICALLY SHOWS OF WHAT'S IN THE PREPARATION IN FUTURE, BUT ON THE OTHER HAND IT ALSO SIGNIFIES WHAT HAS BEEN MATERIALIZED NOW. HERE THE NEWBORN BABY ALSO INDICATES A LACK OF RESPONSIBILITY IN THE WAY YOU MATERIALIZE, WITHOUT PROPER CARE, OR THE ABILITY TO DECIDE. YOU ARE SHOWN EMOTIONAL AND OTHER FORMS OF ATTACHMENTS AND DEPENDENCIES. AND AT THE SAME TIME, IT IS TOO INTIMATE TO BE ON THE SAME BED WITH YOUR INNER KASARA, THE INNER NEWBORN BABY AND YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THE DEEP NEED OF SPIRITUAL LOVE THAT YOU ARE SEEKING... ] , Ha [- she is my elder sister in reality, she is 7 months pregnant with a baby boy. She represents a part of my femininity and the emotional world: too soft, too open, too receptive, fragile, lacks ability to defend herself, lacks opinions, choices for herself, easily listen to the arrangement of others SO SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTING YOUR FEMININE POLARITY AND IN A WAY YOUR BEHAVIOUR IN EARLIER YEARS WHEN YOU WERE WITH PHUONG AND DEPENDENT ON HER SO YOU CAN SEE HOW PROFOUND THE UNIVERSE ARRANGES DREAMS AND CERTAIN LIFE SITUATION TO LEARN FROM IT AND EVOLVE... ] 's child. The opening dream shows that I am being overly protective of myself, too secure, lacking in outward expression (my position is in the innermost). At the same time, on the outside action side, I sometimes appear too soft, fragile, to be protected, attracted attention, too open, joking. My inner Kasara in the middle is like a protective wall that I built to protect myself. HERE THE MAIN MEANING IS ABOUT WANTING TO FUSE TOO MUCH WITH OTHERS... AND THE BED IS ALSO A SYMBOL OF LAZINESS AS IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE VERY COMFORTABLE REGARDING YOUR SPIRITUAL PATH... YOU WOULD LIKE TO FEEL THE WARMTH OF LOVE... BUT IN A COMPENSATORY WAY... AND THIS WILL LEAD YOU TO CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES AS YOU OBSERVE IN THE FOLLOWING SCENE... Ha told me and Kasara to look after the baby carefully, so as not to let him fall off the bed [- lack of ability to protect oneself on social level, in intimate aspect, difficulty in expressing, actualizing, lack of concentration, sometimes having a slightly careless attitude, joking WE CAN CONNECT THIS WITH THE PART WHERE YOU SHARED IN YOUR PREVIOUS SUBMISSION HOW YOU SEE PHUONG AS SYMBOL TO PROTECT YOU THEREBY WE SEE HERE TOO MUCH DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS THAT CAUSE DIFFICULTIES IN YOUR ACTION WORLD ALSO. ] . It seems the baby is a bit naughty. I feel a dangerous position, but I trust Kasara, so I still focus on talking to Kasara [- too much self- centeredness, lack of proper attention to my ability to express ] SO YOU CAN SEE AGAIN YOU TRUST ON SOMEONE ELSE WHEN A RESPONSIBILITY IS GIVEN TO YOU. HERE SYMBOLICALLY YOUR INNER HA GAVE A CHANCE TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR INNER BABY (REPRESENTING ACTIONS) BUT THE MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ARE STRONG TO BLOCK THE ABILITY TO DECIDE TO TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF. IN OTHER WORDS, YOU SHOULD BE CAREFUL AND DEVELOP YOUR DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN FRONT OF SPIRITUAL PEOPLE... KASARA IS ALSO A COLLECTIVE SYMBOL THUS, SHE ALSO REPRESENTS A PART OF YOU THAT HAS THE POWER TO DIFFUSE KNOWLEDGE ON A COLLECTIVE SCALE... SO YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN LACK DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN CONTACT WITH A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... IT SHOWS THAT WHEN YOU BECOME SPIRITUAL, YOU CAN DEVELOP A SPIRITUAL EGO, HAVING CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES LISTENING TO OTHERS THAT HAVE AN INFERIORITY COMPLEX AND LACK OF SELF-CONFIDENCE... IT IS VERY PROFOUND TO UNDERSTAND THAT... YOU ARE SHOWN HOW YOU COULD REACT IF ONE DAY YOU BECOME A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... SO YOU SEE, YOU CAN GO FROM ONE EXTREME TO ANOTHER...FROM BEING FRAGILE TO BEING TOO CONFIDENT... I was too focused on protecting myself, because it was so safe that no one could interfere, and because it was so easy. And because of the lack of self-interest on the outside (expression, even appearance), my inner baby has a tendency to be disruptive, mischievous to get attention, and as natural of a baby when not cared for or guided. She immediately saw the ghosts and said to me: there are many ghosts around you, even sitting next to you. Are you afraid or do they harm you? I also said that I felt someone sitting next to me, I couldn't see and they didn't harm me, but I felt scared. title_pdf: 07 Life - 22-year friendship [2023]. last case id: C0235. PDF text: Dream date: Saturday, 1 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I chanted Angel Leuviah with the intention that: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend HERE YOU CAN REFINE THIS QUESTION BY SAYING "WHAT ARE MY RESONANCES WITH MY OLD BEST FRIEND ?" TO GET DEEPER IN THE MEMORIES RELATED TO FRIENDSHIP THAT CREATES BLOCKAGES IN DEVELOPING UNCONDITIONAL LOVE, DETACHMENT, BALANCE IN POLARITIES ETC. I have no dreams so I will share our stories and some decode that I can understand. Phuong is my childhood friend (the one I mentioned in dream "Childhood friend"). Our mother is colleague and we were born in the same year. We go to school together. From elementary school to high school, most of the time we were in the same class. We were companions in almost everything during our childhood, from hanging out with friends, doing things together, going to extra classes, even skipping school together. When we're together, mostly Phuong will be the one to protect and support me. Even though I'm the same age, I always call Phuong an older sister. And I don't know what comes from that Phuong always protects me, protects me. Partly since I was born I have been quite thin and small, while Phuong is much taller and also has had a high degree of independence since childhood. SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THAT THE NEED TO FEEL PROTECTED CREATES DEPENDENCIES AND COMPLEXES RELATED TO INFERIORITY AND SUPERIORITY BECAUSE OF LACK OF UNDERSTANDING THAT WE ARE ALWAYS PROTECTED, EVEN IN DIFFICULT TIMES. During this time, I realized that I had no particular personality. As for me, whatever it is, I have no opinions or desires. AND THIS IS COMING FROM PAST LIVES AS A MONK WHERE YOU WERE FOCUSED ON "EMPTY YOUR MIND" Maybe when at home, my family chooses for me, and when outside, Phuong is the one to do it. Gradually, I asked myself the question: what is my personality, what do I want, what do I love. WONDERFUL SELF-QUESTIONING It's like everything I learn follows Phuong. This period may have gradually revealed the manifestations of my apathy (a major cause of my depression in recent years). YES, ALSO THIS OVER-DEPENDENCY ON OTHERS SOMEHOW CREATES A LACK OF IDENTITY, AND SELF-RECOGNITION INSIDE. Even if Phuong loves a music group, she shared it with me. I don't know if I like them or not, but then gradually when I follow this group, I engraved in my heart that I also love them and I don't really know what it is. AS IT CREATES A LACK OF DISCERNMENT. There was once when we chose a high school to attend (a big school in province or a school in Saigon - a better educational environment, so we can pass the exam to a good University). And Phuong chose to move to Saigon, while I have no idea, I just want to go away from home. And Phuong told me that if we go to different schools, our relationship will not be as close as before. And that's one of the reasons why I chose the same high school as Phuong. Even though it's a very expensive school and far from home (a boarding school in Saigon). SO HERE YOU CAN SEE THE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES THAT CREATE A LACK OF DISCERNMENT AND AFFECT YOUR CAPACITY TO DECIDE AND TAKE THE RIGHT DECISIONS. And during 3 years in high school, I gradually realized that I was almost like Phuong's shadow YES, BECAUSE OF A LACK OF SELF- ACKNOWLEDGMENT, AND SELF-IDENTITY. With everyone, we are always together, so no matter what, it will be enough just to tell Phuong, and Phuong will decide everything. And no matter what happens, Phuong will always be the one to notice me, ask about me, and take care of me first BUT THIS CREATES AN IMBALANCE DEAR NHU AS IT CREATES DEPENDENCIES. TRUE UNCONDITIONAL LOVE HELPS DEVELOP DETACHMENT, AUTONOMY AND ABOVE ALL SELF-RESPECT. HERE AS EVERYTHING IS DECIDED BY PHUONG, THIS CREATES DISCREPANCIES DEEP INSIDE YOU . And because of these consolations, I am happy and secure in Phuong's protection, I rely on Phuong, but I have overlooked some things that are important to me YES, ONE OF THE IMPORTANT THINGS THAT YOU HAVE OVERLOOKED IS YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL TO DECIDE WHAT IS RIGHT FOR YOU... The universe arranged for Phuong and me to go to different senior classes, and later to different universities. I gradually had to make my own decisions, communicate with people and express myself more. I find that the way I show myself has many actions and gestures like Phuong, although inside I feel quite confident, I realize that I am only confident in a very small circle. But out of that circle, I was scared, self-deprecating and timid. YES AND THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON EVERYTHING ON PHUONG... When I was at university, I was completely separated from Phuong in terms of residence, school, and circle of friends, I really had a clear space to continue to learn the lessons that the Universe arranged and reexamine the relationship with Phuong. During the 4 years, we had times when we didn't see each other. At this time, I am like a bird released from a cage, I plunge into social events, participate in many activities, jobs about starting a business, getting rich, and activities at school. While Phuong is the opposite, most Phuong rarely participates in activities, but Phuong focuses on resting, making friends, and having fun with friends. SO YOU CAN SEE HOW FOLLOWING YOUR LIFE PROGRAM CAN FREE YOU FROM THE DEPENDENCIES AND HELP YOU REALIZE YOUR OWN INNER POTENTIAL... And up to a time, Phuong told me: Phuong heard from our friends that I have changed a lot since university. They see me as a person with unlimited positive energy toward career and personal development. This is also the period when I started to have debts for investment and business to establish a business. I also did not think that I was reckless enough to dare to owe a huge amount of money when I was a student, when I could not earn much money. And especially before that, I had no concept that I needed a lot of money, before that, I was just an ordinary person and lived a normal life, with no special interests. BECAUSE THE DEPENDENCIES IN THE PAST CREATED THE OTHER EXTREME IN ORDER TO COMPENSATE FOR THE FREEDOM AND HERE THIS FREEDOM IS MORE INCLINED TOWARDS MATERIAL POSSESSIONS AND NOT THE TRUE INNER FREEDOM... IN THE PAST, YOU WERE MORE LIKE AN ANCIENT MONK WHO WAS TOO DETACHED FROM MATTER BUT THE MATERIALISTIC MEMORIES FROM EVEN DEEPER ANCIENT PAST LIVES WERE NOT ACTIVATED... When entering the Internship to prepare for graduation, I have a lot of worries about investments, my own business, debts and family, and Phuong has environmental work problems with colleagues, bosses. And Phuong came to me to share. At this time, for me, these problems I have experienced a lot and understand in depth when I have been in contact with many businesses and people outside of society. And I share Phuong my advices, but maybe because she doesn't have as much experience as me, we can't understand each other, and I feel like I can't listen to other people's problems anymore. BECAUSE EARLIER THERE WAS NO LIMIT OR BOUNDARIES IN YOUR DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG , SO NOW THE SOUL WANTS TO HAVE THOSE BOUNDARIES, AND LIMITS IN ORDER TO PROTECT ITS INTIMACY, BUT THIS CREATES A DISTANCE AS THERE IS LESS UNDERSTANDING NOW. IN A WAY, IF YOU OBSERVE THE PATTERN AND THINK DEEPLY, YOU WILL FIND THAT THERE WAS A LACK OF UNDERSTANDING EARLIER ALSO BECAUSE MOST OF THE TIME PHUONG WAS DECIDING FOR YOU AND YOU WERE FOLLOWING BECAUSE OF A LACK OF INNER ASSERTION... And a few months before we graduated, I decided to end our 22-year friendship, because I don't know any better way to stop receiving problems from Phuong. Looking back now, I know I was too harsh on myself, in this relationship. Because maybe I have a very high ego inside OK..BUT THERE IS ANOTHER PERSPECTIVE ALSO THAT YOU SHOULD CONSIDER AND THAT IS RELATED TO THE DYNAMICS OF LACK AND COMPENSATION OF 23/07/2025, 12:13 22-year friendship | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/108424 2/3 DEPENDENCIES AND FREEDOM OF CHOICE, the Universe has arranged that during my childhood I did not have the opportunity to express myself, and when I was able to express myself, I overreacted. I also learned about 2 polarity relationships. Because during University time, Phuong once admitted to me that she was a lesbian. At that time, I don't really know how it will affect our relationship, so I just listen and let it be. SO YOU SEE THE WAY YOU USE THE WORD "SOULMATE" IN THE PERSONAL RESEARCH IS ACTUALLY SHOWING YOU THE MEMORIES OF DISCREPANCIES AND IMBALANCE IN THE POLARITIES AS NORMALLY THIS WORD SHOULD BE USED IN A COUPLE RELATIONSHIP... From my inner Phuong, I can realize that I have comparisons, low self-esteem, a tendency to be jealous when I am not valued, even bad thoughts about the person who protected me. But I know this is a lesson that the Universe has arranged for me to understand myself and realize what I need to transform. ALSO, THESE MEMORIES ARE A RESULT OF YOUR OVER-DEPENDENCIES ON PHUONG ALSO... Angelic thank you DEAR NHU, A CONCRETE SITUATION, ANY REALITY EXPERIENCED OR YOUR EXPERIENCES (REAL LIFE STORIES) CAN BE DECODED LIKE A DREAM BY MARKING IMPORTANT SIGNS AND SYMBOLS AND INTERPRETING THEM WITH PLUS, MINUS. REMEMBER A FEW OF THE IMPORTANT DIVINE LAWS THAT SAY - DREAMS ARE REALITY AND REALITY ARE DREAMS, EVERYTHING IS A SYMBOL... ANGELIC CONTINUITY WITH JELIEL & HAHAIAH ÂN
