PDF text: Dream date: Friday, 7 April 2023 Angel: 19 Leuviah Dream mood: Surprise Dream and Analysis: Angelic hello teachers ANGELIC HELLO DEAR NHU I continue my intention: please help me understand the memories of my old best friend. During the day SO THE DAY HERE SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTS THE ACTION WORLD THAT HAS MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES. IT'S LIKE SOMETIMES THE DECISIONS THAT YOU MAY TAKE RELATED TO WORK/ACTION WORLD IS IMPACTED BECAUSE OF THE DISTORTED MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS, TO PLEASE OTHERS... , on the bed SO THIS CAN HAVE AN AFFECT ON YOUR PERSONAL INTIMACY AND RECEPTIVITY, I lie in the innermost , Kasara [- a part of my feminine polarity and my emotional world: too rigid, too frank, outspoken (so straightforward that sometimes may not pay attention to the listener's feelings), lack of empathy, tolerant, overly emotionally independent, high ego, disinterested in others, tendency to judge others VERY WELL DEEPENED... AND THIS INNER KASARA CREATES LACK OF RECEPTIVITY INSIDE ] is in the middle, and the outermost is a newborn baby [- represents my future, the ability to actualize, express, motivation for the future project (boy): has a joking attitude, lacks the right seriousness, lacks concentration, protects myself OF COURSE ON ONE HAND A NEWBORN BABY SYMBOLICALLY SHOWS OF WHAT'S IN THE PREPARATION IN FUTURE, BUT ON THE OTHER HAND IT ALSO SIGNIFIES WHAT HAS BEEN MATERIALIZED NOW. HERE THE NEWBORN BABY ALSO INDICATES A LACK OF RESPONSIBILITY IN THE WAY YOU MATERIALIZE, WITHOUT PROPER CARE, OR THE ABILITY TO DECIDE. YOU ARE SHOWN EMOTIONAL AND OTHER FORMS OF ATTACHMENTS AND DEPENDENCIES. AND AT THE SAME TIME, IT IS TOO INTIMATE TO BE ON THE SAME BED WITH YOUR INNER KASARA, THE INNER NEWBORN BABY AND YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THE DEEP NEED OF SPIRITUAL LOVE THAT YOU ARE SEEKING... ] , Ha [- she is my elder sister in reality, she is 7 months pregnant with a baby boy. She represents a part of my femininity and the emotional world: too soft, too open, too receptive, fragile, lacks ability to defend herself, lacks opinions, choices for herself, easily listen to the arrangement of others SO SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTING YOUR FEMININE POLARITY AND IN A WAY YOUR BEHAVIOUR IN EARLIER YEARS WHEN YOU WERE WITH PHUONG AND DEPENDENT ON HER SO YOU CAN SEE HOW PROFOUND THE UNIVERSE ARRANGES DREAMS AND CERTAIN LIFE SITUATION TO LEARN FROM IT AND EVOLVE... ] 's child. The opening dream shows that I am being overly protective of myself, too secure, lacking in outward expression (my position is in the innermost). At the same time, on the outside action side, I sometimes appear too soft, fragile, to be protected, attracted attention, too open, joking. My inner Kasara in the middle is like a protective wall that I built to protect myself. HERE THE MAIN MEANING IS ABOUT WANTING TO FUSE TOO MUCH WITH OTHERS... AND THE BED IS ALSO A SYMBOL OF LAZINESS AS IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE VERY COMFORTABLE REGARDING YOUR SPIRITUAL PATH... YOU WOULD LIKE TO FEEL THE WARMTH OF LOVE... BUT IN A COMPENSATORY WAY... AND THIS WILL LEAD YOU TO CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES AS YOU OBSERVE IN THE FOLLOWING SCENE... Ha told me and Kasara to look after the baby carefully, so as not to let him fall off the bed [- lack of ability to protect oneself on social level, in intimate aspect, difficulty in expressing, actualizing, lack of concentration, sometimes having a slightly careless attitude, joking WE CAN CONNECT THIS WITH THE PART WHERE YOU SHARED IN YOUR PREVIOUS SUBMISSION HOW YOU SEE PHUONG AS SYMBOL TO PROTECT YOU THEREBY WE SEE HERE TOO MUCH DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS THAT CAUSE DIFFICULTIES IN YOUR ACTION WORLD ALSO. ] . It seems the baby is a bit naughty. I feel a dangerous position, but I trust Kasara, so I still focus on talking to Kasara [- too much self- centeredness, lack of proper attention to my ability to express ] SO YOU CAN SEE AGAIN YOU TRUST ON SOMEONE ELSE WHEN A RESPONSIBILITY IS GIVEN TO YOU. HERE SYMBOLICALLY YOUR INNER HA GAVE A CHANCE TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR INNER BABY (REPRESENTING ACTIONS) BUT THE MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ARE STRONG TO BLOCK THE ABILITY TO DECIDE TO TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF. IN OTHER WORDS, YOU SHOULD BE CAREFUL AND DEVELOP YOUR DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN FRONT OF SPIRITUAL PEOPLE... KASARA IS ALSO A COLLECTIVE SYMBOL THUS, SHE ALSO REPRESENTS A PART OF YOU THAT HAS THE POWER TO DIFFUSE KNOWLEDGE ON A COLLECTIVE SCALE... SO YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN LACK DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN CONTACT WITH A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... IT SHOWS THAT WHEN YOU BECOME SPIRITUAL, YOU CAN DEVELOP A SPIRITUAL EGO, HAVING CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES LISTENING TO OTHERS THAT HAVE AN INFERIORITY COMPLEX AND LACK OF SELF-CONFIDENCE... IT IS VERY PROFOUND TO UNDERSTAND THAT... YOU ARE SHOWN HOW YOU COULD REACT IF ONE DAY YOU BECOME A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... SO YOU SEE, YOU CAN GO FROM ONE EXTREME TO ANOTHER...FROM BEING FRAGILE TO BEING TOO CONFIDENT... I was too focused on protecting myself, because it was so safe that no one could interfere, and because it was so easy. And because of the lack of self-interest on the outside (expression, even appearance), my inner baby has a tendency to be disruptive, mischievous to get attention, and as natural of a baby when not cared for or guided. YES, BUT THIS WAY OF SEEING IS MORE ON THE OUTSIDE. HERE IN THIS PART, THERE WAS A CHANCE FOR YOU TO TRANSFORM THE DEPENDENCIES BUT INSTEAD, YOU CHOSE TO BE DEPENDENT... YOU CAN COMPLETE THE UNDERSTANDING WITH THE COMMENTS ABOVE... When Ha passed by, she saw that the baby was slightly rocking and seemed to be about to fall off the bed. Ha reminded myself and Kasara. At this time, Kasara hugged the baby in her arms [- This action shows that I have the ability to protect, comfort and care for my inner baby, but it is only done when prompted. And this action sometimes I just do it, not because I really care about my inner baby (shown in the saying of my inner Kasara). This shows that inside I still have a disinterest, indifference to myself and to the world around me. This probably comes because I'm too much overprotected by my inner Phuong (the old best friend I'm asking about). I rely on Phuong too much, so it can be assumed that Phuong will always protect me, so this part has created my lack of ability to protect, care and express on the outside AND BECAUSE DEEP INSIDE, YOU HAVE ALSO MEMORIES OF OVER-CONFIDENCE AND SPIRITUAL EGO... SOMETIMES YOU CAN DIMINISH YOURSELF IN ORDER TO RECEIVE ATTENTION AND COMPLIMENT... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE OF COURSE... ] and said that if my child died, I would not regret it HERE THIS IS ON THE EXTREME SIDE OF BEING DETACHED. THIS PART OF DREAM SHOWS YOU TO DEVELOP THE EQUILIBRIUM BETWEEN ATTACHMENT AND DETACHMENT, FIRST AND FOREMOST BY UNDERSTANDING THEIR REAL MEANING AND THEN BY BEING RESPONSIBLE AND DETACHED AT THE SAME TIME BUT IT TAKES TIME DEAR NHU, FIRST IT REQUIRES WORKING ON MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES AND UNDERSTANDING THE MEANING OF TRUE SPIRITUAL AUTONOMY, SO THIS DREAM IS A PRECISE ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION WITH HELP OF WHICH YOU CAN EMBARK OF THE BEAUTIFUL JOURNEY OF DEVELOPING A TRUE SPIRITUAL AUTONOMY... Then she put the baby inside, between herself and me. I was amazed and thinking: oh, how can Kasara be so independent, so determined and so unattached like this? [- I think too positive. The action of my inner Kasara can be interpreted in a positive sense, but here is the negative case, and that should not be with a newborn baby so should be viewed in a negative light. WELL UNDERSTOOD, IT'S MORE LIKE BEING ATTRACTED TOWARDS THE CAPACITIES OF OTHERS (LIKE BECOMING A FAN) AND THIS WAY OF SEEING OTHERS BLOCKS THE DISCERNMENT ] AND WHEN YOU HAVE THIS LINE OF CODE, IT IS IMPORTANT NOT TO BE IMPRESSED BY "FALSE" SPIRITUAL PROFESSORS THAT YOU CAN EASILY ENCOUNTER NOWADAYS... YOU CAN WRONGLY PERCEIVE THE QUALITIES OF SOMEONE WHILE THE SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR IS NOT REALLY RIGHT... THAT IS WHY AT UCM, IT TAKES A MINIMUM OF 5 YEARS TO BECOME A THERAPIST... AND THEN WITH THE EXPERTISE DEGREE, THERAPISTS CAN BECOME PROFESSORS IF THEY WISH... THE TRAP FOR A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR IS TO LET THE SPIRITUAL EGO DEVELOP... AND THE MORE YOU WILL EVOLVE AND FREE YOURSELF FROM EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES, THE MORE YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SEE THOSE PATTERNS IN YOU AND OTHERS... YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN BE TOO DETACHED AND IT IS NOT GOOD EITHER... AS SAID ABOVE, IT IS IMPORTANT TO DEVELOP BOTH THE QUALITIES OF RESPONSIBILITY AND DETACHMENT... A moment later, Kasara was talking to me about Ha's problems. She stood next to the bed, pointed directly at Ha [- self-judge (my inner Ha), because my inner Ha is so fragile, even at times I think it can be too weak ] who was lying on the bed and holding the baby in her arms, and said: emotional dependence. AND YOU SEE HOW YOUR INNER KASARA CAN BECOME VERY INTENSE AND LACK DIPLOMACY... AND THIS IS THE CONSEQUENCE OF SPIRITUAL EGO, BECAUSE YOUR INNER KASARA COULD HAVE SHARED PRIVATELY TO YOUR INNER HA... BUT DOING THAT IN FRONT OF OTHERS CAN BE TOO INTENSE FOR YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THAT THE SPIRITUAL EGO FROM YOUR INNER KASARA CAN SOMETIMES DIMINISH OTHERS... YOU SEE THAT IF YOU ARE IN A POSITION OF TEACHING OTHERS, YOU CAN LACK LOVE AND BE TOO DIRECT, YOU CAN LACK DIPLOMACY... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE... AND REMEMBER ALSO, THIS DREAM IS HAPPENING IN ONE OF THE MOST INTIMATE PLACE, IT MEANS THAT THOSE MEMORIES ARE STILL WITHIN YOU AND PROBABLY NOT MANIFESTED ON THE CONCRETE LEVEL... BECAUSE YOU COULD ACT CONCRETELY VERY DIFFERENTLY AS A FRAGILE AND SHY PERSON BUT INSIDE, YOU CAN FEEL THE SUPERIORITY COMPLEX, THE NEED TO TEACH OTHERS, MIXED WITH EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES AND 23/07/2025, 12:14 Kasara and baby | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/108818 2/3 THE NEED OF RECOGNITION... THAT BEING SAID, YOU NEED TO ALWAYS REMEMBER THAT A DREAM IS A PERCENTAGE OF YOU... IT IS NOT THE WHOLE YOU YOU HAVE WONDERFUL QUALITIES WITHIN YOU... I followed Kasara's hand pointing at Ha and was a bit surprised. THIS SURPRISING ENDING IS HOWEVER NOT POSITIVE BECAUSE THERE ARE STILL MEMORIES THAT BLOCK THE RESPONSIBILITY AND ACCOUNTABILITY TOWARDS SELF... I have a certain % that can judge others, based on the spiritual knowledge I have learned, I can see a % of what knowledge I am relying on to be able to tend to want to teach others. Perhaps the fact that I have found myself tending to judge others, however, here my surprise at the fact that my inner Kasara was the one to speak out shows that I still lack humility, too knowledgeable, and use the knowledge they know to believe that I am superior to others and have the ability to judge people. IT'S WONDERFUL TO SEE THE HUMILITY IN DESCRIBING THE SITUATION... IT IS VERY WELL UNDERSTOOD... The dream also made clear the answer I asked about the resonances with my old best friend: emotional dependence. NOT ONLY EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES BUT OTHERS MEMORIES THAT ARE DESCRIBED ABOVE... And having 3 women in my dream shows that I have built my inner self (Angel 3 Sitael) in these memories since childhood (Phuong is my best friend and Ha is my biological elder sister outside in real life). WELL DECODED During working with Angel Leuviah this week, I feel my physical body is quite tired, sluggish, lethargic, I have a sore throat and a little nausea (manifestations like having a cold). At the same time this week I am also in the new phase of going to the gym, so maybe these events, which are similar to this dream, show me about illness, lack of ability to protect myself outside (weak physical body). BUT ALSO AN ABILITY TO WORK ON THE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES TOO. REMEMBER AS THIS IS A DREAM, IT IS SHOWING YOU A %, YOU ALSO HAVE WONDERFUL QUALITIES DEAR NHU THAT ACTUALLY HELPED YOU TO GET A PRECISE ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION IN THIS DREAM... When I reflect on myself, during the last time I worked at the company, I realized that my ability to express myself (talk, give opinions and act) was quite weak. In most of the meetings, I keep silent, listen and act WHILE INSIDE YOU HAVE PROBABLY, AT TIMES, YOUR INNER KASARA THAT IS INTENSE OR CRITICIZING CERTAIN ACTIONS , however, recently the results of the implementation have been unsatisfactory and always need to be revised. I've been thinking back to myself for the past 2-3 years, at work (jobs that carry energy fueled by excessive material needs, authority, feminine tends to dominate, masculine sometimes a bit soft), I feel like I'm stuck, not able to show my full potential like before. I also tried, but failed. Perhaps in myself, there is resistance, self-limitation, and self-protection against the desire to receive these energies (in the direction of denial). SOMETIMES WHEN THERE ARE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES OR ANY OTHER FORM OF DEPENDENCIES IT CAN RESULT IN LOW SELF-CONFIDENCE VERSUS OVER-CONFIDENCE... . THIS CAN CREATE DIFFICULTIES IN ACTIONS, BECAUSE OF A SENSE OF ENSURING PROTECTION ALL THE TIME, MEMORIES OF PLEASING OTHERS IN ORDER TO BE IN THEIR GOOD BOOKS, EGO IN CERTAIN % THINKING THAT OTHERS WON'T UNDERSTAND WHAT YOU SAY/EXPRESS, PLAYING SAFE ALL THE TIME, ETC MAKES YOU FEEL STUCK, BUT WITH A DREAM LIKE THIS ANSWERING DIRECTLY, PRECISELY AND GUIDING YOU TOWARDS THE CAUSE CAN HELP YOU RE-GAIN THAT SELF- CONFIDENCE AND HUMILITY BACK DEAR NHU. IF YOU WISH, YOU CAN WORK WITH ANGEL 27 YERATHEL, TO REGAIN CONFIDENCE BACK IN YOUR DECISIONS... IT'S LIKE SOMETIMES THE DECISIONS THAT YOU MAY TAKE RELATED TO WORK/ACTION WORLD IS IMPACTED BECAUSE OF THE DISTORTED MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS, TO PLEASE OTHERS... , on the bed SO THIS CAN HAVE AN AFFECT ON YOUR PERSONAL INTIMACY AND RECEPTIVITY, I lie in the innermost , Kasara [- a part of my feminine polarity and my emotional world: too rigid, too frank, outspoken (so straightforward that sometimes may not pay attention to the listener's feelings), lack of empathy, tolerant, overly emotionally independent, high ego, disinterested in others, tendency to judge others VERY WELL DEEPENED... AND THIS INNER KASARA CREATES LACK OF RECEPTIVITY INSIDE ] is in the middle, and the outermost is a newborn baby [- represents my future, the ability to actualize, express, motivation for the future project (boy): has a joking attitude, lacks the right seriousness, lacks concentration, protects myself OF COURSE ON ONE HAND A NEWBORN BABY SYMBOLICALLY SHOWS OF WHAT'S IN THE PREPARATION IN FUTURE, BUT ON THE OTHER HAND IT ALSO SIGNIFIES WHAT HAS BEEN MATERIALIZED NOW. HERE THE NEWBORN BABY ALSO INDICATES A LACK OF RESPONSIBILITY IN THE WAY YOU MATERIALIZE, WITHOUT PROPER CARE, OR THE ABILITY TO DECIDE. YOU ARE SHOWN EMOTIONAL AND OTHER FORMS OF ATTACHMENTS AND DEPENDENCIES. AND AT THE SAME TIME, IT IS TOO INTIMATE TO BE ON THE SAME BED WITH YOUR INNER KASARA, THE INNER NEWBORN BABY AND YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THE DEEP NEED OF SPIRITUAL LOVE THAT YOU ARE SEEKING... ] , Ha [- she is my elder sister in reality, she is 7 months pregnant with a baby boy. She represents a part of my femininity and the emotional world: too soft, too open, too receptive, fragile, lacks ability to defend herself, lacks opinions, choices for herself, easily listen to the arrangement of others SO SYMBOLICALLY REPRESENTING YOUR FEMININE POLARITY AND IN A WAY YOUR BEHAVIOUR IN EARLIER YEARS WHEN YOU WERE WITH PHUONG AND DEPENDENT ON HER SO YOU CAN SEE HOW PROFOUND THE UNIVERSE ARRANGES DREAMS AND CERTAIN LIFE SITUATION TO LEARN FROM IT AND EVOLVE... ] 's child. The opening dream shows that I am being overly protective of myself, too secure, lacking in outward expression (my position is in the innermost). At the same time, on the outside action side, I sometimes appear too soft, fragile, to be protected, attracted attention, too open, joking. My inner Kasara in the middle is like a protective wall that I built to protect myself. HERE THE MAIN MEANING IS ABOUT WANTING TO FUSE TOO MUCH WITH OTHERS... AND THE BED IS ALSO A SYMBOL OF LAZINESS AS IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE VERY COMFORTABLE REGARDING YOUR SPIRITUAL PATH... YOU WOULD LIKE TO FEEL THE WARMTH OF LOVE... BUT IN A COMPENSATORY WAY... AND THIS WILL LEAD YOU TO CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES AS YOU OBSERVE IN THE FOLLOWING SCENE... Ha told me and Kasara to look after the baby carefully, so as not to let him fall off the bed [- lack of ability to protect oneself on social level, in intimate aspect, difficulty in expressing, actualizing, lack of concentration, sometimes having a slightly careless attitude, joking WE CAN CONNECT THIS WITH THE PART WHERE YOU SHARED IN YOUR PREVIOUS SUBMISSION HOW YOU SEE PHUONG AS SYMBOL TO PROTECT YOU THEREBY WE SEE HERE TOO MUCH DEPENDENCIES ON OTHERS THAT CAUSE DIFFICULTIES IN YOUR ACTION WORLD ALSO. ] . It seems the baby is a bit naughty. I feel a dangerous position, but I trust Kasara, so I still focus on talking to Kasara [- too much self- centeredness, lack of proper attention to my ability to express ] SO YOU CAN SEE AGAIN YOU TRUST ON SOMEONE ELSE WHEN A RESPONSIBILITY IS GIVEN TO YOU. HERE SYMBOLICALLY YOUR INNER HA GAVE A CHANCE TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR INNER BABY (REPRESENTING ACTIONS) BUT THE MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES ARE STRONG TO BLOCK THE ABILITY TO DECIDE TO TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF. IN OTHER WORDS, YOU SHOULD BE CAREFUL AND DEVELOP YOUR DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN FRONT OF SPIRITUAL PEOPLE... KASARA IS ALSO A COLLECTIVE SYMBOL THUS, SHE ALSO REPRESENTS A PART OF YOU THAT HAS THE POWER TO DIFFUSE KNOWLEDGE ON A COLLECTIVE SCALE... SO YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN LACK DISCERNMENT WHEN YOU ARE IN CONTACT WITH A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... IT SHOWS THAT WHEN YOU BECOME SPIRITUAL, YOU CAN DEVELOP A SPIRITUAL EGO, HAVING CERTAIN DIFFICULTIES LISTENING TO OTHERS THAT HAVE AN INFERIORITY COMPLEX AND LACK OF SELF-CONFIDENCE... IT IS VERY PROFOUND TO UNDERSTAND THAT... YOU ARE SHOWN HOW YOU COULD REACT IF ONE DAY YOU BECOME A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR... SO YOU SEE, YOU CAN GO FROM ONE EXTREME TO ANOTHER...FROM BEING FRAGILE TO BEING TOO CONFIDENT... I was too focused on protecting myself, because it was so safe that no one could interfere, and because it was so easy. And because of the lack of self-interest on the outside (expression, even appearance), my inner baby has a tendency to be disruptive, mischievous to get attention, and as natural of a baby when not cared for or guided. YES, BUT THIS WAY OF SEEING IS MORE ON THE OUTSIDE. HERE IN THIS PART, THERE WAS A CHANCE FOR YOU TO TRANSFORM THE DEPENDENCIES BUT INSTEAD, YOU CHOSE TO BE DEPENDENT... YOU CAN COMPLETE THE UNDERSTANDING WITH THE COMMENTS ABOVE... When Ha passed by, she saw that the baby was slightly rocking and seemed to be about to fall off the bed. Ha reminded myself and Kasara. At this time, Kasara hugged the baby in her arms [- This action shows that I have the ability to protect, comfort and care for my inner baby, but it is only done when prompted. And this action sometimes I just do it, not because I really care about my inner baby (shown in the saying of my inner Kasara). This shows that inside I still have a disinterest, indifference to myself and to the world around me. This probably comes because I'm too much overprotected by my inner Phuong (the old best friend I'm asking about). I rely on Phuong too much, so it can be assumed that Phuong will always protect me, so this part has created my lack of ability to protect, care and express on the outside AND BECAUSE DEEP INSIDE, YOU HAVE ALSO MEMORIES OF OVER-CONFIDENCE AND SPIRITUAL EGO... SOMETIMES YOU CAN DIMINISH YOURSELF IN ORDER TO RECEIVE ATTENTION AND COMPLIMENT... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE OF COURSE... ] and said that if my child died, I would not regret it HERE THIS IS ON THE EXTREME SIDE OF BEING DETACHED. THIS PART OF DREAM SHOWS YOU TO DEVELOP THE EQUILIBRIUM BETWEEN ATTACHMENT AND DETACHMENT, FIRST AND FOREMOST BY UNDERSTANDING THEIR REAL MEANING AND THEN BY BEING RESPONSIBLE AND DETACHED AT THE SAME TIME BUT IT TAKES TIME DEAR NHU, FIRST IT REQUIRES WORKING ON MEMORIES OF DEPENDENCIES AND UNDERSTANDING THE MEANING OF TRUE SPIRITUAL AUTONOMY, SO THIS DREAM IS A PRECISE ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION WITH HELP OF WHICH YOU CAN EMBARK OF THE BEAUTIFUL JOURNEY OF DEVELOPING A TRUE SPIRITUAL AUTONOMY... Then she put the baby inside, between herself and me. I was amazed and thinking: oh, how can Kasara be so independent, so determined and so unattached like this? [- I think too positive. The action of my inner Kasara can be interpreted in a positive sense, but here is the negative case, and that should not be with a newborn baby so should be viewed in a negative light. WELL UNDERSTOOD, IT'S MORE LIKE BEING ATTRACTED TOWARDS THE CAPACITIES OF OTHERS (LIKE BECOMING A FAN) AND THIS WAY OF SEEING OTHERS BLOCKS THE DISCERNMENT ] AND WHEN YOU HAVE THIS LINE OF CODE, IT IS IMPORTANT NOT TO BE IMPRESSED BY "FALSE" SPIRITUAL PROFESSORS THAT YOU CAN EASILY ENCOUNTER NOWADAYS... YOU CAN WRONGLY PERCEIVE THE QUALITIES OF SOMEONE WHILE THE SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR IS NOT REALLY RIGHT... THAT IS WHY AT UCM, IT TAKES A MINIMUM OF 5 YEARS TO BECOME A THERAPIST... AND THEN WITH THE EXPERTISE DEGREE, THERAPISTS CAN BECOME PROFESSORS IF THEY WISH... THE TRAP FOR A SPIRITUAL PROFESSOR IS TO LET THE SPIRITUAL EGO DEVELOP... AND THE MORE YOU WILL EVOLVE AND FREE YOURSELF FROM EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES, THE MORE YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SEE THOSE PATTERNS IN YOU AND OTHERS... YOU SEE HERE THAT YOU CAN BE TOO DETACHED AND IT IS NOT GOOD EITHER... AS SAID ABOVE, IT IS IMPORTANT TO DEVELOP BOTH THE QUALITIES OF RESPONSIBILITY AND DETACHMENT... A moment later, Kasara was talking to me about Ha's problems. She stood next to the bed, pointed directly at Ha [- self-judge (my inner Ha), because my inner Ha is so fragile, even at times I think it can be too weak ] who was lying on the bed and holding the baby in her arms, and said: emotional dependence. AND YOU SEE HOW YOUR INNER KASARA CAN BECOME VERY INTENSE AND LACK DIPLOMACY... AND THIS IS THE CONSEQUENCE OF SPIRITUAL EGO, BECAUSE YOUR INNER KASARA COULD HAVE SHARED PRIVATELY TO YOUR INNER HA... BUT DOING THAT IN FRONT OF OTHERS CAN BE TOO INTENSE FOR YOUR INNER HA... IT SHOWS THAT THE SPIRITUAL EGO FROM YOUR INNER KASARA CAN SOMETIMES DIMINISH OTHERS... YOU SEE THAT IF YOU ARE IN A POSITION OF TEACHING OTHERS, YOU CAN LACK LOVE AND BE TOO DIRECT, YOU CAN LACK DIPLOMACY... IN A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE... AND REMEMBER ALSO, THIS DREAM IS HAPPENING IN ONE OF THE MOST INTIMATE PLACE, IT MEANS THAT THOSE MEMORIES ARE STILL WITHIN YOU AND PROBABLY NOT MANIFESTED ON THE CONCRETE LEVEL... BECAUSE YOU COULD ACT CONCRETELY VERY DIFFERENTLY AS A FRAGILE AND SHY PERSON BUT INSIDE, YOU CAN FEEL THE SUPERIORITY COMPLEX, THE NEED TO TEACH OTHERS, MIXED WITH EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES AND 23/07/2025, 12:14 Kasara and baby | DSSI Portal - Universe/City Mikaël https://dssi.ucm.ca/en/dream/108818 2/3 THE NEED OF RECOGNITION... THAT BEING SAID, YOU NEED TO ALWAYS REMEMBER THAT A DREAM IS A PERCENTAGE OF YOU... IT IS NOT THE WHOLE YOU YOU HAVE WONDERFUL QUALITIES WITHIN YOU... I followed Kasara's hand pointing at Ha and was a bit surprised. THIS SURPRISING ENDING IS HOWEVER NOT POSITIVE BECAUSE THERE ARE STILL MEMORIES THAT BLOCK THE RESPONSIBILITY AND ACCOUNTABILITY TOWARDS SELF... I have a certain % that can judge others, based on the spiritual knowledge I have learned, I can see a % of what knowledge I am relying on to be able to tend to want to teach others. Perhaps the fact that I have found myself tending to judge others, however, here my surprise at the fact that my inner Kasara was the one to speak out shows that I still lack humility, too knowledgeable, and use the knowledge they know to believe that I am superior to others and have the ability to judge people. IT'S WONDERFUL TO SEE THE HUMILITY IN DESCRIBING THE SITUATION... IT IS VERY WELL UNDERSTOOD... The dream also made clear the answer I asked about the resonances with my old best friend: emotional dependence. NOT ONLY EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES BUT OTHERS MEMORIES THAT ARE DESCRIBED ABOVE... And having 3 women in my dream shows that I have built my inner self (Angel 3 Sitael) in these memories since childhood (Phuong is my best friend and Ha is my biological elder sister outside in real life). WELL DECODED During working with Angel Leuviah this week, I feel my physical body is quite tired, sluggish, lethargic, I have a sore throat and a little nausea (manifestations like having a cold). At the same time this week I am also in the new phase of going to the gym, so maybe these events, which are similar to this dream, show me about illness, lack of ability to protect myself outside (weak physical body). BUT ALSO AN ABILITY TO WORK ON THE MEMORIES OF EMOTIONAL DEPENDENCIES TOO. REMEMBER AS THIS IS A DREAM, IT IS SHOWING YOU A %, YOU ALSO HAVE WONDERFUL QUALITIES DEAR NHU THAT ACTUALLY HELPED YOU TO GET A PRECISE ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION IN THIS DREAM... When I reflect on myself, during the last time I worked at the company, I realized that my ability to express myself (talk, give opinions and act) was quite weak. In most of the meetings, I keep silent, listen and act WHILE INSIDE YOU HAVE PROBABLY, AT TIMES, YOUR INNER KASARA THAT IS INTENSE OR CRITICIZING CERTAIN ACTIONS , however, recently the results of the implementation have been unsatisfactory and always need to be revised. I've been thinking back to myself for the past 2-3 years, at work (jobs that carry energy fueled by excessive material needs, authority, feminine tends to dominate, masculine sometimes a bit soft), I feel like I'm stuck, not able to show my full potential like before. I also tried, but failed. Perhaps in myself, there is resistance, self-limitation, and self-protection against the desire to receive these energies (in the direction of denial).
